SA10ksmadhlu:2: vaśena grastā hi praṇaṣṭaprajñā nāgārjunādīṃśca mahāmahimnaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:7: paramārthagambhīrodadhinayamanavagāhya atra kecidāhuḥ - yuktyāgamābhyāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sidhyatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:12: prekṣakāstatpravacanamata - mabhyupagamyamānebhyo 'pi niḥsaṃśayaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpratipādakaṃ kimapi vacanamupadarśayituṃ na śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:18: trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ parikalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannānāṃ kramaśaḥ lakṣaṇata utpattitaḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ sandhāya sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā uktāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:26: tena sarvabhāvā api mṛṣā eva vyavasthāpyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:31: na khalu sarve bhāvāḥ pratyakṣata evaṃ viviktāḥ [śūnyāḥ] anubhūyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:33: abhāvāya tāvad nīrūpatayā na kathamapi svarūpopadarśanena vijñānajanakatvaṃ yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:40: atha kaiścid arthāntarā viviktateti pakṣo gṛhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:41: tadā itareṇa tāvat pratyakṣeṇa śūnyatā grāhyā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:42: sarvadharmaḥsvabhāvavādiṣu ye kecana [dharmāḥ] pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyante [te] sarve dharmā viviktāḥ pratīyeran /
SA10ksmadhlu:47: [5] ayaṃ tāvad [viṣayaḥ] sarvajñādīnāṃ yogināṃ pratyakṣeṇa sugamya ityucyamāne 'pi na khalu vidvadbhyastṛptimāsādayati,
SA10ksmadhlu:53: [6] nāpyanumānenāpi 'sarve bhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ' iti sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:56: svabhāvāśrayarahitaiḥ sarvahetubhiḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sādhayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:57: [7] paraiḥ siddhatvāt parābhyupagatahetvādibhiḥ svapakṣaḥ prasidhyediti cet tadāpi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:59: ithaṃ yadā parābhyupagatahetvādayo yadi na vāstavikāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:66: parābhyupagatasādhanādayo yadi sanmātrā evābhyupeyante tadā bhāvā api sasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ nābhyupeyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:67: [8] sarvadharmaśūnyatā kutrāpi kenāpi hetunā na sambaddhā,
SA10ksmadhlu:69: yadi [sambandhaḥ] siddhaḥ syāt tadā sarve tattvadarśinaḥ syuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:70: pūrvata eva siddhatvād yuktyanusaraṇamapi nirarthakaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:71: [9] api ca, na tāvat kāryasvabhāvaliṅgābhyāṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā /
SA10ksmadhlu:73: tvanmate tu etau [kāryasvabhāvau] na sambhavataḥ tathā hi - sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena kasyāpi kenāpi saha kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānabhyupetatvāt kāryahetustāvanna sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:74: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvena kasyāpi ātmanaḥ svabhāvasyāsattvāt kutastāvat svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:77_0: sā taditaraviviktasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratītau satyāmapi asacchāstraśravaṇavimūḍhamanasā
SA10ksmadhlu:78: tava tu sādhyamānasarvadharmābhāvavyavahārasya pratyakṣataḥ jñānārthaṃ kiñcidapi nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:81: atyantaparokṣāt sarvadharmavivekāt sahānavasthānavirodhenāpi na kiñcidapi sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:82: yadi sidhyet tadā tadviruddhādayo bhāvatvenaiva sidhyeyurityanabhyupetā na syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:85: ye tatrāvikalakāraṇāni tebhyo niyataṃ yasminna bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:88: yad yasmin parihriyate yanna vicchidyate tayorubhayorabhāvayordvitīyo virodho vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:90: tathāvidhau dvāvapi virodhau sarvadharmāniḥsvabhāvavādiṣu naiva sambhavataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:91: gaganāravindādiṣu na santi avikalakāraṇānyapi tathā nāsti atadvyāvṛttyā paricchedo 'pi bhāvaparyantavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:92: sattāvyavacchena yadyapi paricchedo vyavasthāpyate tathāpi kutracit kācit,
SA10ksmadhlu:94: kintu bhavantastāvat kutrāpi kasyāpi vyavacchedaṃ kathamapi naivābhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:95: yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatāpratyāsannāstadā yuṣmāsu kimapyavikalakāraṇasattvaṃ na sidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:98: tadā ta evāsmāsu vastusantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ tadviruddhopalabdhyasambhavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:102: [13] vyāpakānupalabdhirapi vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau vyāpyaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatvaṃ tu tāvanna kasyāpi vyāpyaṃ sidhyatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:103: yadi sidhyatīti cet tad vyāpyameva hi vastutayā siddhaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:104: [14] kāraṇānupalabdhirapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau kāryatvaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva siddho na bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:105: yadi siddhastadā yat kāraṇaṃ yaccāpi vā kāryaṃ tadeva vastu syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:106: [15] sarvadharmeṣu kasyāpyekasya niṣedhād eteṣāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapyekaṃ kāraṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:109: eteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ nimittānyapi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:111: [17] api ca, nairātmyaṃ yadi sarvadharmagocaratāyāṃ sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:119: [19] yadi lokaprasiddhā rupādayastadā dṛṣṭānta eva tāvannopalabhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:125: yadi sa nirākriyate tadā pratyakṣasyaiva bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:126: yadi sa badhyate tadā nānumānasyāpi sausthityam /
SA10ksmadhlu:127: pratyakṣasambandhādanuprāptānumānenāpi sa eva kathaṃ bādhayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:128: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho na bādhyate tadā vastuvādināmeva sausthityam,
SA10ksmadhlu:130: [21] api ca, sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sādhayitu yadi kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo hetuḥ pradarśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:132: [22] yadi abhāvasvabhāvastadā asadabhavayoḥ parasparasambandhāabhāvāt kathaṃ sādhayiṣyati?
SA10ksmadhlu:136: yato hi tat sādhayituṃ nānyat kimapi pramāṇamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:140: yato hi yadi niḥsvabhāvastadā kathaṃ sa siddhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:168: yanna svato nobhayato nāpi vinaṣṭāddhetornāpyahetuto nābhīṣṭānnityāddhetoḥ kāryotpattirbhavatīti tathāvādinastat [sarvaṃ] yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:173: yato hi yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadeva 'para'ḥ ityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:174: kāryotpādāt prāk pareti nāmro 'siddhatve 'pi bhāvasya tu naiva hāniḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:180: yadyevamasti tadā kasmiṃścidaparasmin drāridrayamūḍhatvādidharmāṇāṃ dṛśyatvena paratvahetoḥ sarvajagaddāridrayādidharmopādānaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:181: [28] avyavahitādavinaṣṭāt parāt kāryotpattau kāryakāraṇasamakālikatvaprasaṅgo bādhakapraṇamiti yadi kaścidevaṃ manyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:188: yathā avyavahitavinaṣṭo bhāva uttarakṣaṇabhāvinā bhāvena saha yugapad vyavasthāpyo na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:191: yathā ca pūrvāparāvyavadhānena pravahamānajaladhārāyāṃ viṣayaikatvaṃ na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:192: tathaiva asyāpi tatsadṛśatvāt samakālikatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:197: yadi vidyamānakāryasyotpattinirṣidhyate tadā tava [pakṣe] ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaśca na syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:201: naiva ca syāt śaśaśṛṅgādyutpattiprasaṅgaḥ tattathāvidhahetūnāmabhāvādanutpatteḥ na tvabhāvāddhetoḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:205: anyathā sāṃvṛtike 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve kathaṃ na sarvataḥ sarvotpattirbhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:206: [31] api ca, yadi vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭādayo vikalpāḥ pāramārthikīmutpattiṃ bādhante,
SA10ksmadhlu:208: vastubalapravṛttasya hetorviṣasya puruṣecchāvaśena vibhāgo na yuktarūpaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:209: yadi patyakṣabādhitatvāśaṅkayā tasmin hetutvaṃ na pravartata ityucyeta tarhi sa hetureva nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:221: tadanantaraṃ yadi sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirna bhavettadā sarveṣāmandhabadhiratvādiprasaṅga ityapi kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:227: anekasmād vā ekasyotpattiḥ [tataḥ sa] viruddho hetusvabhāvātikrānto janakatvenānabhyupagato bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:228: tathāpi vidyamānamātrādanekasvabhāvāt pradīpādeḥ anekasvabhāvaṃ kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:229: hetubhedo bhedako na bhaviṣyatīti na syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:231: hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣotpāda iti yadeva kathanaṃ tadeva hetubhedasya bhedakatvapratipādakamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:232: [33] yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa prakṛtyā śānta ityetadanaikāntikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:237: [34] yo hi paramārthato 'san sa saṃvṛtāvapi svabhāvato 'nutpanno dṛśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:243: ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvāt' ityevamabhidadhānā ye prasaṅgaṃ sādhayanti teṣāmapi tathā parairanaṅgīkārād heturasiddha eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:247: yadi paryudāsātmake tadā ekānekasvabhāvarahitātvasya bhāvasvabhāvatvenābhyupetatvāttadapyanabhyupagataṃ na bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:250: [37] yacca sarvābhilāpavirahalakṣaṇaṃ tanna kiñcid gamyaṃ gamakaṃ vā,
SA10ksmadhlu:256: [39] yadyubhe abhāvasvabhāvatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇāpanne eveti manyase cet,
SA10ksmadhlu:264: [41] atrāpi vyāvṛttyā bheda iti manyate cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:266: yadyevaṃ svād bhāva eva te syātām,
SA10ksmadhlu:268: [42] api ca yathā kenāpi ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvahetunā bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:272: [43] api ca, yadi vijñānamapyanyadharmavat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvaṃ syāttadā tadanupādeyaṃ syād vitathatvādanyadharmavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:274: naiva yogijñānamapi syānna ca taistattvapratibodhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:275: naiva teṣāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ syānna ca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:277: [44] saṃvṛtau yogijñānādīnāmabhyupagamād buddhā api viparyastā bhaveyuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:278: [45] api cāsti bhavatāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvapratijñāyāṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ virodho 'pi /
SA10ksmadhlu:282: [46] agnyādayo ye bhāvāḥ parokṣarvenābhyupagatāste 'pi abhrāntena niyatadhūmādihetunā anumānapramāṇena satsvabhāvātmakā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:289: tānyapi samastalokaikacakṣurbhūtena tāyinā svakīyenānāvṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā pratyakṣīkṛtya anyebhyo 'pi samprakāśitāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:292: [48] bhagavatā khalu ye āntarabahyavastūnāmanekavidhāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ samupadiṣṭāste 'pi svabhāvavirahitāḥ kathaṃ yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:294: [49] kuśalākuśalamarmaṇāṃ phalabhūtā devanarakādigatayo bhavantīti svayambhuva upadeśāt kathaṃ na virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:297: [51] sūtrādiṣu āryāṇāṃ mārgābhyāsabalena yā uttarottaralokottarajñānaphalavyavasthā sāpi na syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:308: no tu nīlam” ityādinā tāvannīlādayo bhāvāḥ kalpānāpoḍhalakṣaṇena pratyakṣapramāṇena jñāyanta iti pratipāditam,
SA10ksmadhlu:309: naiva hi gaganotpalavartīni nīlādīni cakṣurvijñānenānubhūyanta iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:311: tat sarvatra nirodhadharmakam” anena sādhyavyāptahetunānumānapramāṇenopadarśitāḥ kṣaṇasthitadharmiṇo bhāvāḥ prasiddhā iti spaṣṭamupadarśitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:314: [57] “dhūmena jñāyate vahniḥ salilaṃ ca balākayā” iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:315: agnyādayo bhāvāḥ kāryaliṅgena niyataṃ jñāyamānatvānniyataṃ svabhāvamavadhārayantīti suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:317: [58] abhidharmādau ye ṣaḍ hetavaścatvāraśca pratyayā abhihitāste 'pi sarvadharmānutpādavāde tāvatkathaṃ yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:319: [59] sūtreṣu sarve dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyataneṣu saṅgṛhītāḥ samupadiṣṭāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:320: skandhādīnāṃ bhagavatā kāryakāraṇasvabhāvatvasamprakāśanāt kathaṃ te sarvedharmānutpādatāyāṃ saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:321: [60] yadi skandhadivyatiriktasya kasyacid dharmasya anutpādaḥ sādhyate tadā nāsti [kaścit] vivādaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:323: [61] yadyevaṃ manyate yatsaṃvṛtau pramāṇādīnāmabhyupagamānnaiva eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dūṣaṇānāmavakāśo yujyata iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:325: yato hi yāni pramāṇādīni saṃvṛtāvabhyupetāni tāni niścayena sarvābhilāpavidhuralakṣaṇaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vyāvṛttasvabhāvānyeva vyāhatāni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:326: yadyevaṃ na syāttatadā lokavirodha āgamavirodhaśca kathaṃ parihataḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:328: yadi bhavantastānapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmamātramupacāramātraṃ vyavahāramātramiti pravyāharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:331: [62] api ca, kā nāma saṃvṛtirityapi vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:343: bhavataḥ pratijñāyā eva hāniḥ bhavo 'pyutpadyata eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:346: saṃvṛtiviparītasyānutpādasya paramārthatvāt tadā paramārthato 'nutpāda eva syādityasambaddhabhidhānaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:354_0: tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ] tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:354_1: 'saṃvṛtisat' - iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:356: [tathātve ca] anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:359: śāstrakārā vā prākṛtā vā janāḥ prathame vikalpe bhāvo hyanekaparasparaviruddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:363: [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:367: atha bhrāntijñānena māyeti cet tadā ābhyantarikajñeyanayena ko hi viśeṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:370: [68] atha śabdārtha iti cettadā kathabhedaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:371: pratyātmādhigamyā ye sukhādayaste kutra saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:378: athaivaṃ manyate yadābhāsaparikalpyau vyāmiśrya sāmānyākārena gṛhyanta iti?
SA10ksmadhlu:389: [69] atha kṣaṇamātrānantarānavasthānena asthirārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthastadviparītaśca nityārthaḥ paramārtha iti siddhasādhanamevaitat,
SA10ksmadhlu:392: ato nāsti vivādaḥ tathā sāṃvṛtikānāṃ vastusāmānyalakṣaṇāmāṃ yā nairātmyarupā dharmatā sāsti paramārthataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:393: sāpi utpādād vā tathāganāmanutpadād vā sarvakālamavikāratayā nityābhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:394: [70] atha asatyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti tadā kathaṃ sā satyamiti parasparaviruddhayoḥ satyāsatyayoraikātmyānupapatteḥ bhāvasvabhāvaiva kācana saṃvṛtirabhyupagantavyā,
SA10ksmadhlu:395: anyathā kathaṃ jagat tathā satyaṃ sidhyet,
SA10ksmadhlu:400: athāpramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyeta?
SA10ksmadhlu:404: [73] api ca, yadi bhāvasvabhāvā abbhyupagamyante tadā teṣvāropito mithyāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtisatyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:409: tadā saṃvṛtirapi vitathā syāt paramārtho 'pyaśakyavyavasthānaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:411: [74] yadi yathākathañcana kañcidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāttadā kimarthaṃ sa sādhayate?
SA10ksmadhlu:412: sa naiva paramārthaḥ kathaṃ sa jñānenāvadhārayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:413: na ca paramārthaśabdenāpyabhidhātumarhaḥ evaṃ tāvannāyaṃ paramārthaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:417: yadi yathākathañcana kiścidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāt tadā paramārthato 'sadbhāvasyaikasya yathākathañcana nirākaraṇād bhāvasattāyā evābhyupagamaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:424: ataḥ pakṣo 'yam 'na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ' iti na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:426: evaṃ bhinnābhinnatvasya anyo 'nyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvena ekasya pratiṣedhe 'parasya vidhānaṃ na bhavettadā asattvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:427: sa tadā pratiṣeddhumapi kathaṃ śaktaḥ ekasmin yugapatparyudāsaprasajyayorvirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:428: [76] anyacca, bhavatāmanusāreṇa tu puṇyajñānasambhārau duṣparipūraṇau syātām,
SA10ksmadhlu:430: pūjānugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate tad dānaṃ tvatyantaṃ prasādamabhinirvartayati,
SA10ksmadhlu:432: sa cānupalambhaḥ kiṃ deyābhāvād vā viṣayābhāvād vā bhavati?
SA10ksmadhlu:433: prathame tāvat pakṣe na ko 'pi kimapi dadātīti puṇyasyaivābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:434: sattvābhāvācca yo hi bodhisattvānāṃ sattvārthapariśramaḥ sa nirarthaka eva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:438: yadyevaṃ na syāuttadā bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ kathamarthibhyaḥ putrādidānaṃ kṛtam?
SA10ksmadhlu:442: [77] api ca, 'sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ' ityettasya tāvat ko hyarthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:443: yadi svayambhāvasya abhāvānniḥsvabhāvā ityabhidhīyante tadā siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:446: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā nirapekṣatvānnityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:447: yadyucyeta - vinaṣṭā bhāvāḥ svasvabhāvenānutpannatvāt svasvabhāvena na santīti niḥsvabhāvāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:453: kṣaṇikasya khalu vastuno dvitīye kṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ nābhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:454: yadyucyeta yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya paramārthena svabhavato 'sattvād sasattvaṃ tathā niḥsvabhāvatvamiti tadapi siddhasādhanam,
SA10ksmadhlu:456: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:457: paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitena grāhyagrahakāreṇa virāhitā api āryajñānasya advaitātmanā gocaratvena sthitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:462: yadyucyeta ādito 'nutpannatvāt sarve bhāvā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:464: atha pūrvamutpannasya vastunaḥ punaranupattyā sarve dharmā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:472: sarvadā ca pūrvavinaṣṭānāṃ sajātīyotpatteḥ atha bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitasya svalakṣaṇato 'nutpādādanutpāda ucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:475: atha svato 'nutpādād anutpāda ityucyeta tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:478: yadi sarvaśaḥ sarvānutpādād anutpāda ucyate tadā darśanādivirodho durnivāraḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:479: yadi parasparaviśeṣānutpādād anutpādo 'bhidhīyate tadā [yadi] tathatāsvabhavatāmupādāyocyate tadā nāsti doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:480: [kintu] yadi lokaprasiddhasvabhāvatāmupādāyocyate tadā kena darśanādivirodho nivārayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:494: “kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ dharmamayoniśaḥ śabdaśaḥ pravicayya mahāyānaprasadāyatano na bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:495: śabdaśo 'nabhipretya yoniśo manasi kṛtvā mahāyānaprasādāyatano bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:505: sāṃyogikasya svabhāvamabhisandhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yadasattvaṃ samprakāśitaṃ tacchabdaśo 'bhiniviśya [ye] sāṃkleśikadharmāṇāṃ vaiyavadānīkadharmāṇāṃ cāpyasattve 'bhiniviśante,
SA10ksmadhlu:508: [ataḥ] bodhisattvasya śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāyāmasaddṛṣṭi saiva tasya mahatī dṛṣṭiriti,
SA10ksmadhlu:511: tato vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭisaṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭitattvāpavādadṛṣtayastāvajjāyante yadā nimittadṛṣṭyā sarvāpavādaḥ [yadā] kriyate tadā vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭerapyabhiniveśo jāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:521: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
SA10ksmadhlu:522: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca vai na santi ca //
SA10ksmadhlu:523: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ skandhānāṃ sattaiva tāvannirdiṣṭā /
SA10ksmadhlu:525: “asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate” anena tāvad vacanena virodho 'pi samupajāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:526: evaṃ yadi paramārthataḥ karmāpyasti vipāko 'pyasti tadā sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā bhavituṃ nārhanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:527: yadi saṃvṛtau santīti cet tadā karturapi saṃvṛtau sadbhāvāt “kārakastu nopalabhyate” ityevaṃ na vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:530: yadi te bhaved yathā dṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:532: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
SA10ksmadhlu:533: anena yadi sarvadharmāṇāmasattvaṃ tadā saṃkleśavyadānayorapavādadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:537: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:542: ataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena na sidhyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:552: anena tāvad vijñānameva paramārthasattvānidarśanatvādiguṇopetaṃ śāścatocchedāntadvayavinirmuktamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:557: “ye paramārthasato 'pi vijñānasyāpavādaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāmabhiniviśya śūnyatādṛṣṭikāste 'cikitsyāḥ” iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:564: sarvathātyantaviyuktaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ yattanna tenopalabhyata idaṃ śūnyatālakṣanamuktaṃ bhavati” /
SA10ksmadhlu:569: anirvacanīyadharmatāvabodhena saṃskārāsaṃskārābhyāṃ prajñaptamiti yaduktaṃ tena virodhaḥ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:571: nāvaśiṣṭamiti yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tadapi yuktyāgamābhyāṃ viruddham,
SA10ksmadhlu:574: tathā hi kecana parahitāśayā eva pravartante /
SA10ksmadhlu:577: tathaivānye svasukhasampattisādhanatatparā anyavyāghātaṃ kṛtvā tadduḥkhavinivṛttito virajyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:579: tathaivetare tāvad bhavāntarakhecchato viramya svamuktyarthaṃ prayatante /
SA10ksmadhlu:580: aye tu kevalaṃ paravimuktimevānucintayanti saṃbodhinidānāṃ ca dānādipāramitāpravṛttimālambante /
SA10ksmadhlu:583: svābhilāṣadvāreṇaiva pravṛttidarśanād śraddhaiva hi pravṛttiheturiti niścitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:585: ato nānāgotratvāt sattvānāṃ tulyajātīyagotrakairvidhīyamānapratipattiviśeṣānurūpaṃ phalalakṣaṇayānamapi nānā bhavatīti yuktibhirnānāyānataiva niścīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:592: evamevānekeṣu sūtreṣvapi śrāvakādiyānatrayanirdeśād āgamato 'pi tāvannānā yānāni sidhyantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:593: āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādiṣu yaddhi ekaṃ hi yānamiti vyapadiṣṭam,
SA10ksmadhlu:595: dharmadhātulakṣaṇatayā yānānāṃ bhedābhāvād ekameva yānamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:596: athavā yānīkṛtaṃ yānamiti yānikurvatāṃ śrāvakādipudgalānāṃ nairātmye 'tulyatvābhāvād ekameva yānam /
SA10ksmadhlu:598: athavā aniyatagotrakāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ mahāyānenaiva niryāṇād ekameva yānaṃ deśitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:602: athavā bhagavatā svayamanekadhā śrāvakayānādibhirniryāṇadvāraiḥ parinirvāṇasandarśanād ekameva yānam /
SA10ksmadhlu:603: athavā nāsti mahāyānād viśiṣṭataraṃ yānāntaramiti tadadhikārād ekameva yānamiti,
SA10ksmadhlu:607: anyacca, naikabhavaparamparāyāṃ sambhārān paripūrya bodhisattvā buddhatvapadamadhigamiṣyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:608: śrāvakā aśeṣabhavasaṃyojanaṃ prajahantīti teṣāṃ naikajanmasādhyaṃ buddhātvadhigantuṃ ko 'pi bhavapratīsandhirnaiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:609: tathā hi - mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ yaduktaṃ so 'pyātmagrahaprabhava eveti niyatam abhīṣṭaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:611: tatsamucchedena teṣāṃ janmano 'pyādhārarasyābhāvāt tad [janma] api samucchidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:613: āryāsaddharmapuṇḍarīke bhagavatā yacchrāvakebhyo buddhātvādhigatervyākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu nirmitaśrāvakāṇāṃ nirmāṇasya,
SA10ksmadhlu:621: katipayeṣu [sūtreṣu] - “tathāgatagarbhāḥ sarve sattvāḥ” iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tathatālakṣaṇāyāstathatāyā abhiprāyeṇa vyapadiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:626: tatra tāvad 'nāgamataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:628: kiṃ kenāpyanabhyupetatvādāgama ekāntenānupādeya eva bhavatyuta utadeyo 'pīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:639: tadvidāṃ sudhiyāṃ viraheṇa bhagavata ādimadhyaparyavasānakalyāṇaṃ pravacanaratnamanāśritā api kiṃ tāvadadhigatasvaparahitasampādanonopāyaṃ tarkanipuṇaṃ vidvāṃsamapi nāśrayiṣyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:640: athavā, ajñā vaṇijo yathā vimugdhatayānarghaṃ ratnamapi parityajanti tathā suvijñāstarkanipuṇā api vaṇijastanna parigṛhṇantīti na /
SA10ksmadhlu:642: sa cet samyagiti tadā bhavanto 'pi yadi bhagavatpravacanaṃ suparīkṣyaivābhyupayantītyato bhagavatā prajñāpārāmitādiṣu yo hi madhyamo mārgaḥ suspaṣṭamādiṣṭastaṃ kinnāśrayiṣyantīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:643: yadi svayaṃ tamāśrayituṃ na śaktāstathāpyāryanāgātjunapādairyo hyanekayuktipradīpaprakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭastadbalenāpi kimiva nābhyupagacchanti?
SA10ksmadhlu:644: yato hi sa ācāryastāvad bhagadvacananirdiṣṭatvena prathamāṃ bhūmimāsāditatvena cāryalaṅkāvatārādau vyākṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:645: tasyāpi yadi nirdeśo viparyastaḥ syāttadā naiva tāvad bhagavatā tathā vyākṛtaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:646: ato yadayācāryavacānaṃ tyajyate bhagavadvacanamapi nūnaṃ parityaktaṃ bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:647: phalata āryanāgārjunapādapratipadītaṃ mārgaṃ parityajya anāryapudgalapradarśitapathāśrayaṇaṃ tāvānnaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:648: na vayaṃ śabdānāṃ bhāvikaḥ kaścana sambandha iti manyāmahe /
SA10ksmadhlu:650: te tāvat [śabdāḥ] saṅketābhijñānena vyavahāre vakturicchāṃ dyotayante arthāvasthādibhirabhrāntapuruṣairabhihitāḥ śabdāḥ vivakṣitārthāsambaddhā iti na sarvathā niścetuṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:652: kṣīṇarāgadveṣamohānāṃ śabdā aviparītārthā iti pratipādanena sarveṣāṃ śabdā viparītārthā evati na,
SA10ksmadhlu:654: atastrirupapaliṅgāni parikṣaṇapariśuddhāni ādimadhyāntakalyāṇaniyatāni tāvad vacanāni avisaṃvādakatvād vidvadbhiḥ samāśrayaṇīyānyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:655_1: pratipādayāmāstathāpi yadā āgamārthaṃ vinintayāmastadā vyākaraṇapramāṇatvena sampradarśayāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:661: athavā yadartho nānyatra netuṃ śakyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:670: na katipayeṣu” avameva punastatraivoktam - “tadyathāpi nāma devaputra,
SA10ksmadhlu:686: ato yāni ca yāvanti ca paramārthamadhikṛtya anutpādīni lakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni tāni sarvāṇi nītārthatvena grahītavyāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:690: yāvad ye sūtrāntā saṃvṛtipratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante neyārthāḥ yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ paramārthapratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:695: yāvad ye sūtrāntā ātmasattvajīvapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakāravedakān anekarutairasvāmikān svāmina iva nirdiśanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:697: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥsattvanirjīvaniḥpudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāsta ucyate nītārthāḥ - iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:698: sutrāntareṣu 'tāvadanutpādādinirdeśā abhiprāyāntareṇa nītārtha ityabhihitāḥ' - iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:700: ekaṃ hi sthitau ātmādinirdeśā api nītārthāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:706: yadyevaṃ tadā kathaṃ bhagavatā āryasandhinirmocanasūtre trividhasya svabhāvasya trividhāṃ niḥsvabhagavatāmabhipretya sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:710: atha cāsacchastraśravaṇābhiniśavaśād viparyastamatayaḥ saṃvṛtau asantamanṛtamapi nityādivasturupatayā samāropya yathā rūpapratibhāsaṃ tathaiva parigṛhṇanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:711: te āropāpavādāntadvayapatitatamatitayā antadvayarahite paramagambhīre paramārthanayasāgare nānupraviśanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:712_0: ataeva tāvad bhagavān 'anutpādādinirdeśaḥ paramārthādhikṛtaḥ' iti nirucya trividhaniḥsvabhāvatābhiprāyapratipādakamantadvayarahitaṃ0
SA10ksmadhlu:712_1: madhyamapathaṃ madhaymapathaṃ prakāśayituṃ nītārthameva mataṃ pratiṣṭhāpitavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:715: tatravicāritaṃ tāvad vastu yathāpratibhāsaṃ māyāvat pratītyasamutpannam,
SA10ksmadhlu:720: 'yaḥ prattyasamutpannaḥ sa svabhāvataḥ śūnya iti vidvāṃso nirdhārayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:727: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham //
SA10ksmadhlu:728: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:731: yaḥpratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
SA10ksmadhlu:732: yaḥpratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥśūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:735: yacca śūnyaṃ svabhāvena na hi taccasti kutracit //
SA10ksmadhlu:740: yasmin dharme nāsti svabhāvaḥ sa na tāvad vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:743: yadanutpannamaniruddhaṃ tad 'atītam' iti prajñaptuṃ naiva śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:744: na ca tadanāgataṃ pratyatpannamityapi vā prajñaptuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:745: yacca kālatraye 'pyanupapannaṃ tannāma lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ prajñaptamiti vā na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:746: yato hi tat sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ nāmamātrasaṃketamātravyavahāramātrasaṃvṛtimātrābhidheyamātraprajñaptimātrebhyo 'tiriktaṃ nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:752: ato hi bhagavan yacca nāmamātraṃ saṃketamātraṃ na tattathyamiti” vistareṇābhihitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:753: ata eva paratantrasvabhāvo na tathyatve yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:758_0: māyādito 'bhinno yo hi paratantrasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nityānityādibhiḥ paramārthata upacaritaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:758_1: sa eva ca parikalpitasvabhāvaḥ so 'pi yathā parikalpyate tathā lakṣaṇenāsiddhatvāllakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:759: sāpi niḥsvabhāvatā vastutaḥ paratantrasvabhāve eva sthitā /
SA10ksmadhlu:761: ata eva yathā anityādibhiḥ parikalpitāḥ sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato lakṣaṇaśūnyatvena anutpannāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:764: ata eva hi prakṛtiparinirvṛtāḥ āryasandhinirmocane 'pi yathoktam -
SA10ksmadhlu:770: ata evāhaṃ lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhavātābhisandhāya 'sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ' iti yadupadiśāmi,
SA10ksmadhlu:772: paratantrasvabhāvaśca yathā saṃvṛtau hyuktastathā parikalpitātmanā virahitatvena prasidhya saṃvṛtisvabhāvasyānapavādamapi nirdiśati,
SA10ksmadhlu:776: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
SA10ksmadhlu:777: sarve dharmāḥ paramārthataḥ sadā bhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyāmeva pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:780: sa hi pramāṇaiḥ samyugupapatrannasvabhāvatayā paramārtha ityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:792: phalataḥ anutpādideśanāṃ nītārthāṃ sādhayituṃ darśanādivirodhaṃ parihartuṃ yathāśabdaparikalpanaṃ ca nirākartum āryasandhinirmocane tāvadabhihitam -
SA10ksmadhlu:794: paramārthaniḥsvabhāvaṃ dharmanairātmaprabhāvitamityabhipretya mayā sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ sarve dharmā aniruddhāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:797_2: asannimittagrahaṇād asaddarśanaṃ tad bhavedityato nimittadarśanaṃ taducyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:800: yo hi saṃvṛtau hetupratyayabalasambhūtatvena māyāvannisvabhāvatvena ca 'prayogajaḥ' ityuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:803: etadarśaṃ yo hi parikalpitasvabhāva uktaḥ so 'pyāgantuka eva kalpanābhinirhatatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:806: ataḥ sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvenānena paramārthato niḥ svabhāvāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:808: yadi sa tāvadasat svāttadā saṃkleśavyadānadharmā naiva vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyeran,
SA10ksmadhlu:813: te pūrvasvabhāvamapi vasturupeṇa parigṛhya paścāttasyāpyabhāvaṃ matvā anutpannādideśanānāṃ śabdaśo 'rthābhiniveśaṃ kurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:826: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:827: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10ksmadhlu:829: sa tāvad bhāvābhiniveśapūrvaka iti sūtreṣu pratipāditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:832: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
SA10ksmadhlu:833: ato ye khalu bhāvābhiniveśaparaśāste tāvat paratantraṃ sanimittaṃ paśyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:834: ye tu vyapagatabhāvagrāhāste tathā na kurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:838: tatra nityādayo doṣāḥ sambhavanti na vā katham //
SA10ksmadhlu:850: ye puṇyāni na kurvanti narāste kutsitā hatāḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:859: yaddhi proktaṃ tatkathamiti cintāyāmatrāpi yathā kathitasya parikalpitasvabhāvasya samāropo bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:865: ataḥ - “samāropāpavādaṃ hi vikalpanto vinaśyati” ityuktam / ata eva ca -
SA10ksmadhlu:870: tathā hiyathā vikalpyate tathā paramārthataḥ paratantrasyānutpannatvāt parikalpitātmanā anutpanna eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:872: saṃvṛtyā paratantratayā samutpannatvāt tadāśritā anye vikalpā nirmāṇanirmitasadṛśā samutpadyante / ata eva -
SA10ksmadhlu:877_0: atastatra tatra yā paratantrasvabhāvāstitatvadeśanā yāśca bhāvotpatyādideśanāstāḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:877_1: sarvāḥ deśanāḥ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ bhayahetuparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyotpādāśayena abhiprāyataḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:881: buddhayā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:882: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhayā prakalpyate //
SA10ksmadhlu:883: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:887: ato mahākaruṇāmayena tathāgatena lokabhayaviṣayaparivarjanārthaṃ vyavahāravaśena tasya utpattinirodhau bhavata ityupadiṣṭam /

SA10ksmadhlu:1621: yatra cirakālaṃ nirantaraṃ sādaraṃ sarvadharmanairātmyabhāvanaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1626: spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad yajjñānamavisaṃvādaṇaṃ janayati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1628: sarvadharmanairātmyaviṣayakaṃ yogināṃ jñānamapi spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad avisaṃvādakamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1629: yadyevaṃ sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ yuktibhiḥ susādhyaṃ tadā kathamiva vidvāṃsastatra na pritāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:1635: na ca te 'smābhirnābhyupeyanta iti yaduktaṃ tattathā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1639: sarvasāṃ yuktīnāṃ viṣayasya svabhāvasya cāsiddhatvāt” ietyavamuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1641: itthamasmābhirniḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupete sati yadā bhavantaḥ prasaṅgamāpādayanti tadā sa prasaṅga eva nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1644: tadā sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1649: vayaṃ tāvad bhavadbhiḥ prayuktaṃ dūṣṇamapi paramārthato 'nutpannamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1654: ityaktam / yat paramārthato 'sat tad vyavahāre 'pi pravartituṃ na śakyata ityevaṃ yo hi prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1657: yato hi yena kāraṇena yasyātmanivartanaṃ tena tasya vyavahāranivartanaṃ tu nāsti paramārthasvabhāvavyāptam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1660: paramārthasvabhāvavirāhitā api svapnādayo vividhavyavahāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1661: ataḥ sarve 'pi tāvad vyavahārā nirmāṇasvapnādivadaviruddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1664_1: iti hetoḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve sati nānumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartsyanta iti
SA10ksmadhlu:1666: nirvivādarūpatayā saprasaṅgatvāt paramārtadharmyādibhiḥ anumānādivyavahārāḥ kutrāpi naiva siddhāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1667: tathāpi loke yathāprasiddha eva dharmiṇi vyavahārā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1668: yato hi pravādino hi tattvānirṇayārthameva anumānādivyavahārān prayuñjanti / yathoktam -
SA10ksmadhlu:1678: pramāṇasya tāvat sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tattvapravṛtyarthameva bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1680: pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstrāṇyanadhīyānāsu gopālakāṅganāsu evamupadeśābhāve 'pi dhūmādiliṅgadarśanato 'gnyādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1681: ata eva vayamapi tattvapraveśāya tathatāvyavahārābhyāmanumānādipravartanād doṣarahitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1682: api ca, ye vyavahāreṇānumānādipravṛttau yatrānityādi vastudharmaṃ satsvabhāvaṃ sādhayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1683: teṣāṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ tatra vyavahāreṇa vastubhūtadharmādayaḥ syureva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1684: yato hi tatra tathāvidhā āśrayahīnā sādhyadisthitirnaiva siddhā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1685: yadi tatra tathāvidha āśrayo nāsti tadā sādhyaniṣedhanād āśrayā siddhyākhyo doṣo dīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1686: so 'pi yadi yathābhūtadharmiṇo nivṛttiścettadā niḥsaṃśayaṃ sādhyādidharmiṇo 'vinābhāvasya niṣedhaṃ karoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1687: yato hi asiddhe sati hetvasiddhayādidoṣā dīyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1688: svayamupakalpitānāṃ katipayadharmiṇāṃ nivṛttāvapi sādhayādeḥ kasyāpi niṣedhasyābhāvād asiddhayādidoṣā naiva yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1703: ata eva sādhyadharmaṃ tadanukūladharmiṇaṃ cāvagantuṃ pakṣalakṣaṇavelāyāmeva yuktividbhirviśeṣeṇa 'svadharma' ityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1709: sādhyasādhanayoriva ākāśādirnaiva vastubhūtaḥ svabhāvadharmīti sādhanabhūto 'yaṃ heturāśrayāsiddha ityapare /
SA10ksmadhlu:1710: tatrāpi ākāśadidharmiṇāṃ vastutāyāḥ kṛte 'pyatra nirākaraṇe sādhyābhāvamātramabhyupagacchatāṃ nāsti ko 'pi doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1713: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1714_0: na tu dharmāntarayukto dharmītyevaṃ nirdeśakāle sveṣṭapratyakṣānumānāptaprasiddhidvārā
SA10ksmadhlu:1714_1: niṣedhamavidhāya svabhāvasyaiva tāvanniṣedhaḥ svadharmī bhavatītyatra pakṣadharmatāvasthāyāmācāryeṇa
SA10ksmadhlu:1728: anyathā kramayaugapadyābhyāmabhivyaktena arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogena paraparikalpitaḥ padārthāḥ kathamiva niṣeddhuṃ śakṣyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1730: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato 'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva kasyāpi kathamapi kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1733: nāsti tat kṣaṇikaṃ vāpi saccāpi na hi vidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1736: tairthikaiḥparikalpiteṣu dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyādiṣu niṣeddhumiṣyamāṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā naiva pravartsyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:1737: yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā apramāṇaṃ hi tatra prasaṅgasādhanam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1738: phalata ekāntenaiṣāmabhāvo vyavahāre kathaṃ siddhaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:1740: atha pramāṇameva prasaṅgasādhanamiti cettadā kimiva tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā na pravartante?
SA10ksmadhlu:1741: yukttibalena āgantuśīleṣu doṣeṣu prekṣāvadbhiḥ svataḥ [svapakṣataḥ] siddhirnaiva yuktimatī atha bāhyārthādīn niṣeddhukāmānāṃ vidyata eva vastubhūto buddhilakṣaṇo dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:1743_0: ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo
SA10ksmadhlu:1746: yadi te tatprasiddhatvamabhyupagacchanti tadā bāhyapradhānādivat buddhireva śaktatvaikānekatvavyāptadharmaviyuktatvanniḥsvabhāvaiva tāvat setsyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1750: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāttadā] tato bahyapradhānādayo na niḥsvabhāvāḥ setyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1751: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye 'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1752: buddhau tāvat siddhe 'pi bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1758: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1759: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1760: yato hyanye [vādinaḥ] teṣu tayā utpattimattvābhāvadharmaṃ nābhyupayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1762: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:1764: sa paramārthataḥ svabhāvavirahito 'pi bhrāntyā bāhyamiva pradhānādyabhinnamiva sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ ca sarvadharmasamavetamiva kalpayati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1766: yato hi sa bālairbāhyapadhānādyupagṛhītavādiprativādibhirapi taimirikairdvicandradarśanamiva tadabhinnatayaiva vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1767: sa hi yadyapi [sarvathā] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1768: tathāpi tadākāratayā buddhirityevamupacaryate vastuto 'yaṃ nāsti [kathamapi] buddhisvabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1770: ataḥ siddhe 'pi tasya niḥsvabhāvatve buddhiniḥ svabhāvatāyā nāsti prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1771: yato hi bāhyapradhānādīnāṃ tāvanniṣedhastu pramāṇaiḥ sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1773: vastusatāṃ śabdādibāhyadharmiṇām anityādidharmasiddhaye [te] bāhyaśabdādayastabhinnāśca buddhistha upacāradharmiṇyevāśrayante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1774: yato hi te deśakālādibhīnnāvasthāniyatā bāhyaśabdādayo vādiprativādināṃ buddhau svasvabhāvena naiva pratyakṣībhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1777: ato 'numānāmeyādayaḥ sarve vyavahārā buddhistha eva dharmiṇyāśritāḥ pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1779: yadyevaṃ tadā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve parikalpitadharmiṇaṃ niḥśritya niṣedhādisiddhayartham āśrayāsiddhādidoṣāṇāmapravṛttavapi kāmaṃ balenāsmāsu apālambhāḥ kriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1780: yathā hi paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ bhavantaḥ pradhānādiniṣedhye parikalpitadharmiṇyeva sādhyasādhanādīn manasikurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1781: tathaiva vayamapi prasiddheṣu rūpaśabdādiṣu ye tāvat sadasadādisvabhāvā āropyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1783: tatra yathā āropite dharmiṇi vastutvāropaṇaniṣedhae 'pi vādiprativādiṣu pratībhāsamānatvād asadādidoṣā na pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1786: avabhāso hi tatkāraṇanivṛttyā jāyamānena satyasvabhāvena tāvannasti vyāptaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1788: yadyevaṃ no cettadā sarve puruṣāstadarśinaḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1790: yathaiva hi tasmin parikalpitadharmiṇi sāmarthyaśūnyatvavyāptyupanyāsena niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ prasādhya pradhānādayaḥ sādhyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1791: tathaivāsmābhirapi parikalpitavastuni tat [niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ] samyaktāa sādhayituṃ yathoktaḥ sāmarthyābhāvādiḥ kathaṃ na siddhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1795: atatstannirṇayo na kṛtaḥ vicāro 'pi nirṇayārthaka eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1796: yataḥ pramāṇādvārā siddhāntanirṇayakāle ko 'pi siddhānto nābhyupagato bhavatītyatastasmin kāle kasmin āśrayāsiddhimukhena dharmyasiddhayādidoṣaḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1797: atha vādī pramāṇaistattvanirṇayaṃ kṛtvā parebhyastatpratipādayituṃ pravṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1801: pūrvata eva siddhāntamanabhyupagacchanto vādinaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇatastattvajñānaṃ kurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1802: taireva cāparānapi bodhayantīti kathaṃ siddhanto 'bhyupagataḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1803: pūrvaṃ svayaṃ pramāṇaistattvaściyaṃ kṛvā siddhāntena aparebhyo 'vabodhanamapi nāsti siddham /
SA10ksmadhlu:1804: apare 'pi prekṣāvantastāvat tacchabdamātreṇaiva pramāṇairanupapanne 'rthe naiva viśvasanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1805: ataḥ svamirṇayavad aparebhyo 'pi nirdeśasamaye tādavasthyāt sarvatra pramāṇaireva tattvanirṇayaḥ kriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1807: ata eva kathaṃ tena dharmiṇastāvadasiddhādayaḥ pratīpādyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1808: samyakpramāṇabalena vādināmabhīṣṭasādhyasiddhāvapi 'siddhāntābhyupagamāt tebhyo doṣā jāyante' iti ye vadanti kiṃ teṣāṃ yuktyantaramiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1814: yadi tathāvidho dharmi siddho na syāttadā na ko 'pi kutrāpi tatsādhanārthaṃ pratvarteta /
SA10ksmadhlu:1815: yadi tathāvidho siddhastadā taddharmoṃ 'pi ubhayasammataḥ siddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1817: ata eva sarve tattvajijñāsavaḥ siddhāntaviśeṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamapahāya āgopālaprasiddhameva tamāśritya sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaṃ cintanaṃ parivardhayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1821: [7] “yatkhalu paraprasiddhapramāṇaiḥ svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyaḥ” iti yaducyate tad dūṣaṇameva tāvanna bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1823: ato vyavahāre vayam ubhayasiddhairhetvādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayāma ityevaṃ paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1825: na kenāpi samyagliṅgenāliṅgitā atiparokṣatvād” iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1830: ataḥ avinābhāvaniyamanirdeśena sāmānyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmaṃ sādhayeyuriti kathanaṃ yujyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1831: tadvadatrāpi māyāmaricisvapnagandharvanagarādisadṛśeṣu katipayeṣveva dharmiṣu sa sidhyatītyataḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvād ekānekasvabhāvādidharmeṣu vyāptiḥ siddhaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1832: api ca, asmābhiranyatra savivādeṣu rupādiṣu vyāptidharmopadarśanena sādhitatvānnāsti doṣa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1833: [9-10] ye kecana - “kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ naiva sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti sādhayituṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1837: yadā sādhanasvarupāntaḥpraviṣṭatvādimau vastusādhanāvityucyete tadā niḥsvabhāvatāyāmapi prayogaviśeṣavaśena sādhanasvabhāvāveva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1840: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ “pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ” iti sāmānyena hetulakṣaṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1844: tathāpi imau dvāvapi teṣu vyavahārasatyatvena vidyete eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1846: “kevalaṃ samyak kāryamātreṇa svabhāvamātreṇa vā hetunā bhavitavyam” iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1849: “ādarśadigataḥ pratibimbo hi tāvadanyadekaṃ rūpam” iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1852: “tadeva rūpaṃ tathaivālambyate” idamapi kathanaṃ naiva samīcīnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1859: 'vijñānasyaiva pratibimbākāratayā pratibhāsanādasti sa [ākāraḥ] vijñāsvabhāvena vastusan' idi yaduktaṃ tadapi na yuktiyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1860: yato hi amūrtaṃ nīlādivijñānaṃ niraṃśatayā sthitaṃ vividhākārarahitameva bhavatītyucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1861: pratibimbavastu tadvilakṣaṇatayā pratibhāsata ityataḥ kathaṃ sa [ākāraḥ] tatsvabhāvena san syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1862: yathoktaṃ bhavatāpi triṃśikāyāṃ pudgalaniḥsvabhāvataṃ pratipādayatā yad yo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa sarvathā nithyaiva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1865: tathaivānye 'pi paraparikalpitadharmā naivālambitā bhavantīti kathaṃ nocyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1866: yathācāryairnirdiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsādhanāyāṃ vyāpyānupalabdhikṣaṇā dharmāḥ kathaṃ noktāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1871: [11-12] viruddhopalabdhyādayo 'sambhavā iti yaduktaṃ tā atyasambaddhā eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1872: yato hi sarve dharmā viviktāḥ katipaye ca sahaviruddhā iti na sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1873: tathāpi māyākhapuṣpādayaśca sāmānyatayā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sahaviruddhāśceti sidhyantyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1874: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā katham bhavadbhiḥ paraparikalpitā īśvarādayo niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1875: ataḥ sāmānyena niḥsvabhāvatāmātreṇa yadi vyavahāre viruddhādayaḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1876: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvābhyupagame virusśādharmādīnupadarśaya niḥsvabhāvatvena teṣāṃ samyak sādhanāt kimatra tāvad virodha /
SA10ksmadhlu:1878: yato hi paramārthato niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhūtarupābhivyaktistu,
SA10ksmadhlu:1881: ato yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥsahānavasthānaviruddhāśca sidhyantyatastadviruddheṣu vastutāprasaṅga iti na vaktavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1884: evameva dīpakādau adṛḍhalakṣaṇe vastuni paricchinne sati dṛḍhākāraviviktataiva tāvat paricchidyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1889: sa abhāva eva tāavat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo viradho vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1893: prasiddhe 'pi tasmin virodhe dīpakādayo hi vasturupeṇātyantamanupapannāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1894: māyādimithyāvastuṣvapi jātivināśayoravabhāsamānatvāt ata eva ācāryaiḥ paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ yathā dīpakādiṣu nityānityādivirodho 'vabhāsate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1898: paramārthavastusvabhāvena sahānavasthānalakṣaṇavirodhasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ paramārthavastusvabhāve na kathañcit pravartate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1903: yadi pratyayāntarairvināśa iti tadā na vināśahetubhistatra kimapyupakriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1904: pratyayāntaraiḥ kriyamāṇe 'pi vināśe sa svahetubhireva kriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1906: yadyavastutvād vināśasya tattvena anyatvena vā tasya vijñaptirna yujyata iti cintyate tadā ātyantikatayā sa vināśakāraṇairna kriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1908: ato 'kiñcitkarā agnyādayo hi kathaṃ nāma paramārthato viruddhāḥ setsyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1909: tathāpyagnyādayaḥ śītādīn kramaśo niḥsāmarthalakṣaṇān anityān prakarṣatamān utpādayantyata eva te hyagnyādayo viruddhā iti kevalaṃ vyavahriyanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1910: ata ācāryairvirodhanayo 'yamityukto na tu virodha evetyuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1911: ataśca virodho 'yaṃ vyavahāramātrāśrita evokto na tu paramārthāśritaḥ agniśītādayaśca na paramārthato bāhyārthasvabhāvāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1918: yato hi vṛkṣādayo vyāpakāḥ vastutaḥ sāmānyātmakāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1927: atastāni vyāvahārikeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvena vastusvabhāvatvena vyāptāni bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1928: kintu tāvatā tāni paramārthasvabhāvatayā na samavatiṣṭhante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1929: yato hi vyāpake vidyamāne 'pi sati vyāpyasya siddhirna niyatā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1930: tathāpi vastusvabhāvatvena suvyāptāni kāryakāranavastūni yadi nivatante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1931: tadā māyādivat paramārthataḥ parikalpito vastusvabhāva eva nivartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1934: tairthikaparikalpitatāni pramāṇādīnī tathātāyā ananukūlatvāt parītyājyānītī sanyakpramāṇalakṣaṇapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇayanaṃ kṛtamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1935_0: itthaṃ katipaye tairthikāḥ piṇḍātmādikaṃ mithyāvastutattvaṃ sisādhayiṣayā sarvajñatāvirāgitākarmaphalasambandhādīnāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:1935_1: sāṃvṛtikīṃ vyavasthāṃ nirākartuṃ pramāṇānāṃ viparītalakṣaṇāni kurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1936_1: karmaphalasambandhādivyāvasthāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ viśuddhāni pramāṇalakṣaṇāni viracitavantaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1939: ato virodhādivyavahārāṇāṃ svīkṛtiātreṇa yo hi bhāvasvabhāvābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1942: [20] nanvevamanumānena saha sambandhaprasidhyarthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate tadā vastunastāvat siddhireva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1944: abhrāntajñānenādhyavasitaḥ khalu vastusvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nāmānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:1945: yadi nirakriyate tadā pratyakṣameva tāvad bādhitaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1946: yadi tad bādhitaṃ syāttadānumānameva tāvanna syāt sisthitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1947: pratyakṣasambaddhenāpyunumānena pratyakṣaṃ bādhyata iti kathanato naivācitamanyat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1948: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho 'numānena naiva bādhyate tadā prāpyasya prāptyā susthita eva tāvad vastuvādīti kathanamapi samyaṅnirākṛtameveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1950: tatra yaddhi sādharaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat paramārthamadhikṛtya nāstyabhrāntam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1951: anyathā sarvaṃ yogipratyakṣameva syānna ca syuḥ kecanāpyarvāgdarśinaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1952: yogipratyakṣātiriktaṃ sāmānya pratyakṣaṃ yadyapi [abhrāntaṃ] nāsti tathāpi vyavahāre svapnādivad yathāprasiddhenārthena sahāvisaṃvādāttadabhrāntamucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1957: phalato yadeva sarvākāratattvamadhikṛtyābhrāntaṃ tadeva sarvākāratattvāvisaṃvādād yathārthamabhrāntamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1958: ata eva bhagavadbhireva tāvat sarvadharmalakṣaṇarahitatā parijñātā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1975: yato hi arvāgdarśibhirvāstavikaḥ paramārśasvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣatayā pṛthak pṛthak nānubhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1976: ato naiva vastusvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtimapi bādhate kintu yo hi tatra satyākāratvāropastannirākṛtireva sādhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1977: phalano vastuvādino arthābhāve 'pi arthābhiniveśinaste kathaṃ susthitā iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1978: ekato 'numānaṃ vyavahāreṇa pratyakṣasambaddhaṃ sat sthitiṃ pratnoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1979: aparataśca pratyakṣaṃ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajatitāgniriva tadbādhāṃ karotīti bādhitameva taditi cennaitāvatāsmāsvaniṣṭāpattiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1981: sa ca mithyendhanāni bhasmīkṛtya svayamapyupaśāntaḥ praśāntavikalpalakṣaṇamuttamaṃ nirvāṇamavabodhayatīti / yaduta -
SA10ksmadhlu:1984: ato yadi tattvajñānamutyadyate tadānumānalakṣṇā kalpanā nivṛttā satī nirāśrayāpi nānabhyupagatā [bhavatī] /
SA10ksmadhlu:1985: ata eva bhagavatā ratnakūṭe savikalpāpi sampratyavekṣaṇā nirvikalpajñānaphalotpatteḥ kāraṇamiti [matvā] mahāphalābhinirvṛttaye kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajanitāgnerdṛṣṭāntena nirdiṣṭā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1986: [21] api ca, sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane yadyeko hetubhūto dharmo nīrdiśyate tadā nivṛtisādhakaḥ sa dharmo viruddho jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1987: [22] yadyasan sa dharmastadā asato 'bhāvenāsambaddhatvāt kathaṃ hi sa [abhāvaṃ] sādhayediti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1990: yato hyanena tāvat sadasadubhayadharmāṇāṃ paramārthatvasādhane hetorasambhavatvavocyate yuktijñaiḥ na tu niḥsvabhāvatādisāmānyadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasādhane [sambhavatvamiti],
SA10ksmadhlu:1991: yadi tathaiva syāttadā paraparikalpitānāmīśvarādīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane kathaṃ nāma te sarve codyā nābatariṣyantītī?
SA10ksmadhlu:1992: tad yathā īśvarādiṣu sāmarthyavyāpyavastutvaniṣedhārthaṃ vastusvabhāve samāropaṃ ca nisedhārthaṃ asaddharmā na bhavantyasambaddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1993: evameva paramārthataḥ kāryakārāṇādivastudharmeṣu vyāpakaniṣedhena samāropaniṣedhaṃ sādhayituṃ kathaṃ nāsmāsu sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1995: yato hi vastusati svabhāve na tathā kartuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1996: yadi asatā asambaddhatayā asāmarthaṃ tadā kutra sāmarthyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1997: paramarthato 'sadvastuni na bhavati kaścana sambandho nāma /
SA10ksmadhlu:1999: yathā sadvastuni dharmadharmibhāvādisarvāṇi vastujātāni kalpitānīti vyavasthāpyante tathā asadvastunyapi kathaṃ tāni naiva vyavasthāpyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:2000: api ca, yadā ko 'pi kadācidapi svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvatvena paramārthato naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2003: atasteṣāṃ prativādo vā parīkṣaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA10ksmadhlu:2005: sattvasya tadabhāvasya cāpi hetorānukūlyena vādiprativādinoryathāprasiddhatvena te prasiddhayavinābhūtā evoktāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2006: atasteṣu dharmadharmitvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryatvādīni ca yathā ābhāsante tathaiva sarvā api vyavasthā aviruddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2007: kaiścid vidvadbhiryadi darśanasyāsya dharmadharmiviruddhādyādhāreṇa prativādaḥ kriyate tadā tatra paramārthavyavahāranayānavabodha eva kāranaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2009: [24] tadapi na śabdamātreṇa sidhyatīti yaduktaṃ tanna duṣanamanabhyupagamāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2014: ityevaṃ yadi vastuṣu paramārthasvabhāva eko bhavati tadā prakāradvayameva tatra bhavet hetupratyayāpekṣitatvāt sarveṣām,
SA10ksmadhlu:2019: svabhāve 'smin ubhayamapi prakādvayaṃ paramārthatayā na sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2021: yadi pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā tatra sādhakapramāṇaṃ tadā vastusvabhāva eva pūrvaṃ tāvadubhābhyāṃ na siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2023: kintu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tāvat pratyakṣeṇa na paramārthataḥ siddhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2026: nāpi ca tanmānasapratyakṣaṃ kutrāpi sidhyatīti tatrāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2029: kintu kāryakāranabhūtasya tasyānyārthasya paramārthato jñānagrāhyatvaṃ naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2030: vijñāne svapratibhāsa iva yo hi jñānetarasvabhāvo 'nyāvabhāsaḥ [pratīyate],
SA10ksmadhlu:2039: yo 'pi tadākārastajjñānākārameveti viśeṣābhidhāne satyapi vijñānasadṛśyenaivānyāvabodhaḥ saṃjāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2042: yadi nāsti viśeṣastadārthakriyārthinaḥ svato vastvanudhānena samprayujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2046: jñānasvabhāvasāmyena ca teṣāmapi parasparaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:2047: tadudbhūtatve satīti viśeṣāntaropādāne 'pi anyārthasya pratyakṣatvena pratyatirasambhavaiva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2048: yato hi abhyupagamamātreṇopacaritatvād viśeṣo na prasidhyatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2049: anayacca, anyārtho yadi pratyakṣatvena prasidhyati tadā jñānaviśeṣastāvattatsadṛśastadudbhūto vā sādhanīyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2050: kathaṃ jñānenānyārtho gṛhyata ityevaṃ vicāryamāṇe 'nyārtho yadi pratyakṣato 'siddhastadā kathaṃ tāvadasiddhena svabhāvabiśeṣeṇa siddhā mārgaviśeṣāḥ setsyanta iti yāvat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2051: tadvijñānakṣaṇikatvasyāpi samanantarapratyayārthānubalenopapannatvād yathā jñānāni pūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣatayā samudbhavanti tathā janmāntarāṇyapi sambhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2054: svasiddhāntānusāraṃ ca yathā taddarśanopacāraṃ kurvanti tathā pratyakṣatayāvabhāso nāstyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2059: ariṣṭanīlākṣapītākṣatimirādyapahatanetreṣu dūrasamīpasthita ekasminnapi vastuni vibhinnāni viṣamākārāṇi jñānānyutpadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2060: ato bāhyāvayaviviṣayakaṃ kalpanājālaṃ citte nāstyeva vidyamānam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2065: svapnādiṣu tathānīlādiguvatāmarthāntarāṇāṃ vidyamānatve 'pi nīlādyābhāsijñānānāṃ pṛthaganubhavo bhrānta evaṃ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2067: ye khalu paramāṇvātmakalīādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamāmanvate teṣvapi tāvat samānadoṣatāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2081: yasthūle bhrāntaṃ tattathāgrahaṇataḥ pūrvamapi na [abhrāntaṃ] sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2083: purataḥ pramāṇairyadi pramāṇyaṃ sidhyati tadā yā sthule bhrāntiḥ sā grahaṇapūrvikaivaikā sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2084: yadi na tathā sidhyati tadā sā bhrāntirgṛhītetyeva na sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2091: api ca, yādyākārā yāthātathyenābhyupagamyante tadā yathā vividhānāṃ rekhādīnāṃ vistārastathā jñānākārāṇāmapi ākāravat pṛthaktvam prasajyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:2092: siddhāntavaividhyasthāpanārtham anekajñānānāmutpādamavagacchato vijñānasya viṣayeṣu yathā prasārastathābhāso 'sambhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2094: yadi [ākārāḥ] bhinnāstadā arthasadṛśjñānena teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2102: api ca, yadi jñānasādṛśayaṃ sarvātmanā bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2108: yadi viparyaye hyupacārat karturekadeśa eva tadā sarvatra vastusādṛśyasambhāvanayā sarvajñātṛtvaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2117: yadi sa eva [anubhavaḥ] tadarthākārānubhavatvena gṛhyata iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2125: atyantaparokṣatvādarthāntarāṇāṃ te [arthāntarāḥ] tadīyajñānākāravantaḥ santīti naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2131: tadā yadi sāmīpyād vijñānenārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate tadā sarvāṇyapi vijñānāni sarvasamīpaviṣayakāṇi syuḥ sarveṣu tatsattāyā bhedābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2134: tataśca 'idaṃ nīlaṃ pītamidam' iti vibhāgo naiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2137: kalpanāsvarūpamātre jñānābhinnātmake sādṛśyātiriktatayā na kaścanāpi bhedo bhaviturmahati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2139: sāmīpyavaśājjñānasya yadi nārthāntarādanubhavastadā kathamiti praśne tadutpattyaiveti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2147: viṣayatvābhāvādevendriyaṃ na gṛhyata iti cennaitāvatā tadaviṣāyatvam ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2150: ataḥ aviṣayatvānnāsti tadviṣaya iti kathamiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2162: iti yaduktaṃ tadapyasiddham sākārabuddhayā arthāntaraparicchedābhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniśrcāyakapramāṇābhāve,
SA10ksmadhlu:2164: anayā tāvad yuktyā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cittamātratākāyapramukhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2167: kāryakāranabhāvastu pratyakṣasiddha iti cennaiva tad yuktimat,
SA10ksmadhlu:2170: evaṃ yadi vijñānasya grāhyagrāhakākārarahitatve 'pi tasya vastusattvamabhyupagamyate tadā tatra tathānubhūterabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2172: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarvasyaiva tathatādarśanaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2173: tajjñānamapi yathānubhūyate na tathā sthitaṃ bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2177: yadi jñānaṃ tadā naiva sā pratyakṣam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2183: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāsvabhāvaṃ tadā na tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayakam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2189: yadi sa [grāhyagrāhakākāraḥ] mithyā tadā tadabhinnaḥ kalpanāsvabhāvo 'pi tathaiva mithyā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2190: tathātve kathaṃ sa pratyakṣapramāṇena bhāvasvabhāvaḥ prasidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:2191: yadi viśeṣo [viśeṣyaḥ] mithyā tadā kalpanāsvabhāvasya sāmānyasya vastutā asambhavinī,
SA10ksmadhlu:2193: tadevaṃ tattvajñānasya yathāvadanubhavābhāvānnaiva tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2194: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatve 'pi na hi tena jñānena kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2196: apekṣāviśeṣeṇa tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ parikalpyeta tathāpyarthāntaratvādapekṣāyāḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣābhāve sā naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2197: phalatastadapekṣayā vyavasthitasya tatsvabhāvasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na yuktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2198: kāryātmakasya kāraṇātmakasya ca svabhāvasya arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñānamapi bhinnaṃ bhinnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2200: yadyekasmin jñāne nānubhavastadā na kenāpi sambandhagrahaṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2201: ekajñānāvabhāse 'pi 'idaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cedam' iti pratyakṣe na śakyamubhayoḥ sattāsambandhagrahaṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2205: tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayākarṣiṇā jñānenāpi paramārthatastad dvayaṃ naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2214: yadi pratyakṣeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvo nānubhūyate kathaṃ tadā smṛtisvabhāvo 'pyutpadyeteti cenna,
SA10ksmadhlu:2225: api ca, kāryahetunāpi sa vastutvena sādhayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2230: dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvapi paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye nāstyeva kutrāpi hetovyārptiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2234: taddhetukāle cāśeṣajagato vidyamānatvād 'asmin satī'ti tasya kāraṇatā naiva sarvathā sambhāvyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2239: kasyāpi kāryakṣaṇasya sattvaṃ kasyāpi karaṇakṣaṇasattvād yadi kalpyate tadā tatsamakālaṃ sarvasattvāntargaśeṣavidyamānakṣaṇānāmapi sattvaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2243: tathaiva taddhetukṣāsamākālaṃ sarvasattvāntargatāśeṣakṣaṇā vidyamānā yadi dṛśyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2245: evaṃ sati teṣāṃ kathaṃ na hetutvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2246: api ca, 'yadasti tat sat' ityuktau tacchabdena yadyanyo hetubhūto dharmītyevaṃ gṛhyate tadā so 'pi paramārthataḥ pratyakṣe naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2250: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā sato dharmasya hetutvaṃ naiva sambhavi nāpi cāsato dharmasya yaktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2255: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadāparasyāpi sattvaṃ naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2264: api ca, yā khalu upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā samupalabdhiphalā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2265: īdṛśonānvayena yā karyakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ tatrāpi paramārthataḥ sandehaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2266: kiṃ tattvataḥ sadityataḥ sat atavā adṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ samīpavartitvāt athavā dūredeśasthitasya vastvantarasya samīpavartino balādevaṃvidhaḥ samdehaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2267: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhyā deśāntarāt tadāgamanasya pūrvato vā tatsattvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2269: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2271: ye cānye tatsamarthahetavaḥ teṣāṃ nivṛttau tatphalasyāpi nivṛttau vyatirekena yā tatsiddhiruktā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2275: yathā mātṛvivāhasaṃskāravati deśe janmādānam yatra ca nāsti mātṛvivāhastatrāsat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2276: tatsamarthakāraṇāntarāṇi santītyevaṃ viśeṣābhāvānna syāt sandeha iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2279: kāryakāraṇayoḥ sandehe sati tannaiyatyārthaṃ yadyapi tatkāraṇaṃ samarthaṃ tathāpi prajñākṣetre viśeṣatastadasiddhivacanāni kathaṃ vidvadbhirnirākriyantām /
SA10ksmadhlu:2280: anvayavyatirekau vyatīricya vastuni tatsiddhiniścāyakahetūnāmabhāvāt tatrānavasthādoṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2281: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2282: kintu sahakārivastūnāṃ pṛthaksvabhāva iva anyebhyastadutpattyāśaṅkā kathaṃ nivarteta /
SA10ksmadhlu:2285: nārvagdarśināṃ parebhya utpattiniścayasya spaṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2286: yadi parebhyo 'pi tadutpattistadā na bhaved hetubhedād bheda iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2288: yadi pṛthak tadviśeṣeṣveva te sahakāripratyayā upayujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2293: yadi viśeṣasya pṛthagviśeṣe upacaryamāṇatvāt sa tattvānyatvābhyāṃ cintayituṃ na yujyata iti vyāharanto naiva viśeṣān vyāharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2294: prājñaptikasya kadācidapi hetāvayujyamānatvāt samūhamātreṇaiva tāvadutpattirvibhaktiścāpi vidhīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2297: na ca kāyaṃ vyatiricya samūho bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2299: phalataḥ paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2301: ata ācāryaiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yathāprasiddhi siddha ityuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2303: ityevaṃ paramārthato 'nityasvabhāvam sādhayituṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2306: nityasvabhāvamapi tāvat paramārthataḥ sādhayituṃ nāsti pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2309: ātmādinityavastūnyapi yathā svasiddhanteṣu vijñapyante tathā pratyakṣajñāne naivāvabhāsante /
SA10ksmadhlu:2316: tasya [vijñānasya] vijñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇāt saḥ [vijñeyaḥ] api tad [vijñānaṃ] anusarati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2317: anyathā tena jñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇamapi na kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2325: ata ātmādīnāṃ sukhādiphalena saha kutrāpyanvayo na sidhyati avikalakāraṇatvena na tataḥ kādācitkasukhotpatiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2330: ye tāvad rupādayaḥ prasiddhadharmiṇaste 'pi paramārthato 'siddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2332: anupalabdhyāpi tāvannaiva tatsattvasiddhiḥ pratiṣedhasiddhau samarthatvāt pratiṣedhamātraṃ sā sādhayatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2337: phalataḥ vastusvabhāvaparīkṣaṇārthaṃ nāsti kimapi sādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2338: ataḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ paramārthataḥ sattvena sa naiva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2339: tatra tāvadayaṃ payogaḥ - yasya paramārthaḥ sādhane nasti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2340: kalpanānirmitatvāttasya tathaiva samyaktāyā grahaṇaṃ naiva karttavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2342: uparyuktayorubhayoḥ samyaksvabhāvayoḥ prasiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2345: nāsti hetorasiddhatvamiti yaduktaṃ tat pūrvaṃ vistareṇa vicāritam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2349: tādṛśasya khalu vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kutrāpyanvayaṃ vihāya vyatirekamātrena siddherasambhavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2351: yat sat tat kathamasaditi tannivṛttyā vyatirekī bhavituṃ śaknoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2354: yadi sa svīkriyate tadā kvacittadeva saditi sadavyavahārapramāṇaṃ yat yat sattānuvidhāne prasiddhaṃ tadevāsmākaṃ vastuni prasiddhamiti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2356: evaṃ sadvyavahārapramāṇavyāptamapi pramāṇamātreṇa paramārthatayā naiyatyena sadviṣayitvena naiva setsyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2358: anyathā vṛkṣeṇāpi śiṃśapādiviśeṣā niścayeṇa jñāsyanta iti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2360: evaṃ tāvad vṛkṣastvaśeṣaviśeṣasādhāraṇatvānna tena devalādiviśeṣā nirṇetuṃ śakyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2361: pramāṇaṃ hi naiva tāvad bhāvātikrānte 'parasminnapi sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2363: sarvapramāṇāni bhāvābhivyañjakāni tadvyāptapramāṇabalabhāvivyavahārapravartakānyapi pramāṇāvajñātavastumātre pravṛttatvād vṛkṣādivat kutaḥ sādhāraṇānīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2365: saṃvṛtikajagadarthaviṣayīṇyapi pramāṇani bhavantītyetad bahudhā pūrvaṃ carcitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2369: vaktṛṇāmapi tattvaviṣeye kaścana vivādo na syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2373: tattvajñānārthameva taiḥ sarveṣāṃ mohāvakāśo dūrīkriyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2374: lakṣaṇakārairlakṣaṇeṣu parasparavirodho bhinnasiddhāntapraveśo vā na kariṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2376: ato vyavahārapramāṇaṃ yannaiva paramārthaviṣayi tadapi vyavahārapramāṇaṃ sambhavatyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2380: dehadhāriṇo ye vastusvabhāvasya yathāvat parijñānena saṃsārakārāto mumukṣavasteṣāmavidyā viṣayebhyo vinivṛttavabhāvā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2382: abhīṣṭārthakriyāsādhakarthaprāptimātreṇa puruṣā naiva muktāḥ syuḥ sarvasya muktiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2383: ataḥ avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti yaduktaṃ tat pramāṇasādhāraṇalakṣaṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2385: ataḥ kathaṃ tasmin samyag vastu aviparītatayā setsyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2387: [26-29] ye tāvat paramārthataḥ svaparobhayāhetukato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ samyaktayā niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2389: yāni tāvat svato vā parato vā aviparītayā sadvastūni,
SA10ksmadhlu:2392: yato ye tāvat sāṃkhyādayaste hetuṃ satkāryaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2393: svata eva vastūni jāyanta iti bruvāṇā naiva yuktisaṅgatāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2394: na hi sad vā asad vā vastu svataḥ svahetau niṣpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2398: phalataḥ ko hi nāma kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2401: tadātmanā siddho 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt kastāvat kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2406: yadi sa svabhāvena siddhastadā tasmin aṇumātramapi upakāryasvabhāvasyābhāvāt kathaṃ sa utpādyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2407: aviśeṣaṇīyatve 'pi yadyutpādyatvamahetukatāyāmupakalpyate tadā sajjñānamapi tathaiva kiṃ na parikalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2409: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ “ābhyātmikāyatanāni na svata utpannāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:2411: sajjñānavat” ityasmin prasaṅge prāṅgārthamaviditvā kecana [prayoge] asmin dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2414: ityaṃ pareṣu parasparavirodhaṃ pratipādayiṣayā pareṣu siddhāni sajjñānādīni tāvadudāhriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:2423: pariniṣpannabhāvātmakatve 'pi yadi tadupakāraḥ svīkriyate tadā tadbhinnaḥ sa upakāro na svata utpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2425: yadyabhinnastadopakārasyāpi tathaiva siddhatvāt sa kathamiva setsyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2427: api ca, yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'yaṃ vṛkṣadrumavat paryāyatayocyate tadā na tathā lokaprasiddhiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2430: yadi hetvabhivyaktau vipariṇāme vā sati phalaṃ bhavatīti nirdiśyate tadā evamayaṃ pṛthagvyasthitaḥ saddhetureva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2432: yato hi sa yadi abhivyaktervipariṇāmasya vāvabhāso niścayena tadbhinnastadā kevalādanyasmādutpattirevābhyupagatā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2433: yadi nāsti bhinnastadā kāryakāraṇaviplavadoṣaḥ prasaktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2436: parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇadharmasya itarapratiṣedhakatvād anyatrāsiddhatvācca anubhayapakṣakalpanamapi naiva yuktīmat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2437: api ca, yadyabhīṣṭe taddhetau abhīṣṭaṃ vastu ātmanaḥ purvasvabhāvamaparityajya abhivyaktādyavasthāṃ prāpnoti tadā avasthāvikṛtiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2440: yadi parityajyeti pakṣastadā niraṃśasvabhāvatvāt kaścidapyanvayasvabhāvo na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2443: api ca, vyaktamapyanābhāsitaṃ saditaralakṣaṇatvād itarābhyāmabhivyaktipariṇāmābhyāṃ prabhāvitatvāt parikalpitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2448: etadaviparītatvena paricchede sati na tat paricchedayogyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2449: yasya paricchedakāle yo vicchedyo na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2451: ye parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva yuktarupāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2458: ataḥ yo hi vastubhedaḥ prāgavasthāvilakṣaṇaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2466: iṣyamāṇe 'pi copalabdhisvabhāve prāgvat paścādapi anupalabdhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2469: dugdhādīnāṃ śatadhā vināśe 'pi yā hi dadhyādirupeṇa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2471: api ca, yaḥ kaścid dṛḍharupeṇa bhāvasvabhāvastatsya kathamanyathā vikārānubhavaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2472: yadi sa tāavadadṛḍhasvabhāvastadāpi bhaṅguratvānniranvayaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syāditi tasyāpyanyathā vikārānubhavo naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2473: ato 'bhivyakteḥ pariṇāmasya cāyujyamānatvād yā hi tābhyāṃ svata utpattiparikalpanā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2475: yadi ākasmikī tavat svata utpattistathāpi yaddhi vastūnāṃ deśakālasvabhāvaniyatattvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2477: nirapekṣeṣu tāvad vastuṣu tathāvidhā naiyatyāmbhāvanā naiva yuktimatī /
SA10ksmadhlu:2478: yadi hi parasāpekṣatvaṃ tadā parata utpattiḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2479: na hi upakārābhāve apekṣā nomopapadyate sāpi paścānniṣetsyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2480: apekṣāyā api tāvat sadā saṃnihitasvabhāvatvāt sarvadaivotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2481: ityevaṃ vyavahāre 'pi tāvat svata utpādo 'sambhava eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2484: tadā sa [parākhyaḥ pratyayaḥ] nityo vā bhaved, anityo va /
SA10ksmadhlu:2489: phalataḥ kathaṃ nāma tasmāt kramaśo 'rthakriyā sampasyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2497: asattve 'pi tatpratibaddhātmabhāvasya prāpyamāṇatvād buddhiparikalpitā apekṣā tāvad vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2498: kintu tadabhinirhārāya yo hi apratisāmarthyavān hetuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2501: ato nityatvena yadabhīṣṭaṃ vastu sadaivopakaroti tadapratihatasamarthyaṃ hetuṃ parityajya kathamanyān apekṣiṣyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2505: yena tebhya utpattimasvīkurvadbhirbalena “naivotpādyante” ityevam ātmabalopadarśanaṃ kariṣyate, nānyatra /
SA10ksmadhlu:2507: evameva kāryāṇi yadi hetudharmān nānusaranti tadā tadabhinnatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādeveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2509: akramādapi hetoḥ kramiṇaḥ kāryasyotpādo na virudhyatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2511: yataḥ 'kāryāṇi sarvān hetudharmān nānuvidadhate' ityevaṃ tatkathanaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2514: kimapi kāryaṃ nityasya vastano vyatirekaṃ naivānuvidhatte,
SA10ksmadhlu:2518: avikale 'pi kadācit kāryotpādābhāvāt yad yatra anvayavyatirekau nānuvidhatte,
SA10ksmadhlu:2521: sataḥ kāryasya tāvat [kvacidapi] apekṣā naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2524: itthaṃ nitye tāvat kramaśo 'rthakriyā na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2526: yato hi tasya tathāvidhārthakriyāyā vinaṣṭasvabhāvamanusṛtya kāryotpattirvā tadviyogo vā na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2527: yadi tatsāmarthyasvabhāvaṃ paścatkāle 'pi anusarati tadāpi tena sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yāni pūrvotpannani tāni naiva punarutpādayituṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2529: yadanyat tatsadṛśaṃ tatkathaṃ notpadyata iti virodhaparīkṣāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2533: tata utpādyasya kāryasya anutpattāvapi tadutpattisāmarthyasvabhāvānusaraṇaṃ pratihataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2534: yo yadā yadutpādayati tadā tasmin apratihatasāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti kathanaṃ naiva yuktimattaram /
SA10ksmadhlu:2535: tasmādayaṃ pūrvamapi paścātkāla iva anutpādaka eva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2537: tataśca paścātkāle 'pi pūrvavad utpādaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2538: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā viruddhadharmayogād asmaikatvahāniḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2543: ato parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhāntaro na sidhyatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2548: ataḥ kalpakalpāntareṣu aviśeṣatayā sthitatvāt pūrvavat paścādapi tasya vināśo naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2550: yathā te atītādapi vipākahetoḥ kāryotpattiṃ varṇayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2553: evaṃvidha upacāro vā vartamānakriyākramo vā atītāddhetorbhavatīti vādo naiva sarvathā yuktaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2555: yadi tata utpattiraṅgīkriyate tadā ahetuta eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2558: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā vartamāna iva anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvāt kathaṃ hi sa atīta iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2563: evaṃ sati vinaṣṭāyāḥ kriyātaḥ kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2565: kathaṃ hi kāryotpattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ kriyāvināśa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2566: ekasvabhāvātmake vastuni kriyāvanti akriyāvanti ca kāryāṇi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2572: anyathā pūrvavat paścādapi sā tathā bhavituṃ na śaktā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2573: api ca, kriyā nāma sā kiṃ samarthasvabhāvā yaduta karmasvabhāvā?
SA10ksmadhlu:2574: yadi tat svabhāvadvayaṃ vastunaḥ sakāśād bhinnaṃ tadā kathaṃ nāma tad [vastu] vinaṣṭamityabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2575: yadi tadupahatasvabhāvaṃ tadā samastavastuno nityasattāvādasya hāniḥ prasajyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2576: arthāntaravināśe satyapi vastuno hyacalasvabhāvasya vināśo naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2577: yathā mṛte 'pi devadatte yajñadattasya anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvānmṛta sa iti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2582: tasyāmapi tulya eva virodhaḥ parīkṣā ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:2584: anyārthatve sati kriyāyāḥ vastu tāvad ahetukameva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2588_1: kriyā yadā vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā svabhāvata evotpādayati
SA10ksmadhlu:2590: arthāntarasya pakṣatve anyārthakalpanāyām anavasthādoṣānnaiva [kadāpi] hetutvaṃ sidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:2591: vastūpakārābhāvād 'asyeyaṃ kriyā' - iti sambandha eva na siddhaḥ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:2593: upakārakatvameva yadi vastutvenāṅgīkriyate tadā kriyātmakatvād vastunaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2594: kriyāmupakarotīti cettadā kāryamapi kathaṃ na tathaivopakaroti?
SA10ksmadhlu:2596: yadi kriyā hi sanmātravastusāpekṣaiva tadā avikalahetutvāt sadā talsamīpavartinī eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2598: yadi sā arthantarabhūtā tadā sambandhastāvadasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2599: kriyāṇāmeva parasparayogād vastu tāavad gauṇameva sthāsyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2600_1: karmasvabhāvatvaṃ naiva yujyate ye tāvadakṣaṇikāste sadā ekasvabhāvatvenāvasthitvānnaiva
SA10ksmadhlu:2601: ataḥ keṣvapi 'karma kriyate' iti na sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2608: vastunaḥ svasvabhāva iva kriyāyā api avināśaprasaṅge sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2609: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2610: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti kalpyate tadā prajñaptisattvāt sā avastveva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2618: yadi aprāptakriyastāvadanāgata ityucyate tadā tadānīṃ tasmādapi kāryotpattiḥ ātyantikatayā naiva yuktimatī,
SA10ksmadhlu:2620: yadi vastu sarvadā vidyamānaṃ tadā tasyāḥ prāpteravikalakāraṇānāṃ sadbhāve 'pi kimiva kriyā naiva prāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2621: nāpi kriyā vastunaḥ sakāśādarthāntarabhūteti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2622: yadi nāsti arthāntarabhūtā tadā kriyāvat svabhāvo 'pi naiva aprāptaḥ syādabhinnatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2624: vastunaḥ svabhāva iva tadabhinnā kriyāpi sarvadā sadeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2628: yadi tataḥ [vartamanāt] kāryaṃ samutpadyate tadā samakālaṃ vā samutpadyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:2631: kāryotpattitaḥ pūrvaṃ śaśaśṛṅganibhād asatkāraṇād utpādo naiva yuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2632: yasmin kāle ca hetorātmabhāvaḥ [kāryotpadane] samarthastasmin kāle kāryasyāpi samakālaṃ sattvāt siddhameva tat [kāryam] iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2633: atastasmin [karye] sa hetuḥ kamapi vyāpāraṃ naiva karoti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2636: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva bhaṅgaḥ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2637: viṣama [bhinna] kālamiti pakṣo 'pi naiva sambhavati evameva yadi kāryaṃ [utpādāt] pūrvameva sat syāt tadānāgatotpādaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2639: yadi [kāryaṃ] kṣaṇāntaravyavadhānenotpadyate tadā tadatītādevotpadyata iti naiva yuktamityuktapūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2646: atra bhagavatāpi - “asmin satīdaṃ bhavati” iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2647: tāḥ kalpanāḥ punaḥ - kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2650: avyavahitatve sati dvitīyakṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ vā - ityevaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2651: tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2661: ityaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe vidyamānaṃ kāryameva hetoḥ samutpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2663: tato 'vyavahite dvitīye kṣaṇe kāryasattāyā anubhavārtham - “asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī” tyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2667: prathame kṣaṇe kāraṇasya avinaṣṭātvāt tadavyavadhānenaiva ca kāryasyotpādāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2671: vidyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kālāntarāvyavahitaṃ ca kāryaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2674: niraṃśe tāvad vastuni kālāntareṇāvyavahite ca sati samakālikatvaṃ muktvā nānyā gatiḥ sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2676: yadi nāsti madhye kālāntarāstitvaṃ tadā avaśyaṃ pūrvāparatoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃsparśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2677: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ [kṣaṇānāṃ] ekasminneva kṣaṇe samanupraveśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2678: [phalataḥ] yathā paramāṇoḥ sarvātmanā saṃyoge piṇḍasya aṇumātratāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2680: yathā khalu deśakramaḥ pramāṇairavabhāsamānatvāt saṃvṛtau svīkriyata tathā kālakramo 'pio tatsadṛśa eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2682: tatra prayogaḥ - ye sarvātmanā kālāntareṇāvyavahitāsteṣu pūrvāparakālabhedo na sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2690: abhāvena ca saha sarvātmanā vā ekadeśena vā avyavahitatvamiti cintā na pravartata iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2692: tayormadhye kasyā api kālāntarasadbhāvasambhāvanāyā abhāvānnaiva tadā hetvabhāvayogaḥ sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2698: yadi tad vartamānaṃ tadā [tasya] asattven saha virodha āpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2699: yadi tat sadityabhyupeyate tadā avyavahitatvadicintā kathaṃ na pravṛtā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2701: kintu kāryasattākāle tadasaditi hetoḥ avyavahitatvādicintā naiva kāryeti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2704: itthaṃ tu bhavantaḥ kāraṇasya nirantaratve satkāryasyotpattiṃ varṇayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2707: nirantaratvam avyavahitvaṃ saṃspṛṣṭatvamityādīnāmabhinnārthakatvāt tadabhyupagamasāmarthyena kāryakāraṇaikatvamapyabhyupagataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2709: api ca, vinaṣṭahetoḥ kāryotpattiprasaṅgasya ayujyamānatvād bhavantastaṃ [pakṣaṃ] parityajya vartamānahetoravyavadhānena kāryotpattimabhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2710: tatra tāvat kiṃ sarvātmanā kāryotpattiṃ svīkurvanti yaduta ekadeśeneti cintā pravṛttaiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2713: tatra ca ye nāpyekadeśena na ca sarvātmaneti bruvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2714: tena taiḥ kimucyata iti vicāryamāṇe avyavahitamapi nāpyavyavahitamiti kathanaṃ paryavasyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:2716: api ca, yadi vidyamānakāryakāle kāraṇaṃ nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2717: tadā 'avinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kāryamutpadyata' iti naiva kathanīyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2719: yasmin kāle kāraṇam avinaṣṭaṃ tasmin kāle kāryamapi nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2721: evaṃ cintyate - svayaṃ vināśavyavahite 'pi vastuni nāsti samakālikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2723: tathaivātrāpi kāryakāranayorasamīcīnarūpatve 'pi samakālikatvaṃ nāstītyayaṃ vicāraprakāro na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2725: evaṃ tatra sadasadbhāve yadyekadeśenāvyavahitatvaṃ tadā avayavisadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2727: tathaiva chāyātapayorudakadharāyāṃ cāpi yadi sarvātmanāvyavahitatvaṃ tadaikadeśatvameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2729: asmākaṃ tu [mate] sarva evāyaṃ sadasadbhāvaḥ paramārthato 'siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2731: avyavahitatvādisamudbhūto 'sadbhāva iti nāsti kaścana vyavahārastathāpi dvipīye kṣaṇe vastūni svasvabhāvanirodhamātraṃ prajñapayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2736: kāryakāraṇayostu paramārthataḥ sattvabhyupagamād ekadeśenāvyavahitatvādicintā tāvat pravartata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2737: āryaśālistambasūtre yo hi bhagavatā tulādaṇḍopamayā avyavahitatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'bhihitaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2752_1: yadapi bhagavatā 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' ityuktaṃ tena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:2752_2: eva vikalpo 'bhyupagamyata iti yaduktaṃ tad vakṣyate kiṃ 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati'
SA10ksmadhlu:2752_3: iti vacanena vikalpatrayaṃ niṣidhya caturthavikalpābhyupagam āgamena nirdiṣṭo yaduta yuktyā?
SA10ksmadhlu:2755: yato hi yau chāyāṅkurau dīpaprakāśau vā samakālavidyamānau tāvapi dīpe sati prakāśo bhavatīti na vyavahāraviruddhau /
SA10ksmadhlu:2758: yadi hi vastutvaṃ pramāṇāntaraiḥ paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikatvena sādhyate tadā tadapi parikalpitamātrameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2760: itthaṃ tu loke 'pi samakālikaṃ chāyāṅkurādikamapi kāryakāraṇabhāvena jñāyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2766: yato hi yathā yuktyā vikalpatrayaṃ na sambhavati tathā caturtho 'pi vikalpaḥ paramārthato naiva sambhavatīti [pūrvaṃ] vistarena nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2768: na tvāgamena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2770: phalataśca sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyeva prajñāptyā utpādādibhya eva santuṣyatām ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2776: ato ye ācāryāḥ “na paramārthata adhyātmikānyāyatanāni praratyayataḥ samutpadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2784: vyavahāre parataḥ siddhatvānnastyasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇasyāpi [bhavanmate paramārthataḥ] samyagvastutvāddhetvādīnāṃ na vyavahāraḥ kutrāpi sidhyatīti nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2786: tairthikāḥ ye hi parādivyavahāravaśāt parādīni santīti kathayanti tān ācārya āha -
SA10ksmadhlu:2790: parādayaḥ śabdā ye tāvatprajñāptigocarāstānapi paramparayā vastusaṃsargiṇa ityabhidadhatāṃ teṣāṃ 'vastusabhāvaḥ pratyayeṣvastītyutpadyate' ityumamabhiprāyamādāya dūṣaṇaṃ pradattam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2791: pratyayādiṣu sattve paramārthato vastusvabhāvasyānutpādāditi vistareṇa khalvabhihitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2792: ato yadā sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ parata utpādo naivopapadyate tadā pratyayādibhyo 'pi anutpādādasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2793: ato nāstyeva paramārthataḥ śabdasaṃsargi kimapi vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:2794: phalato 'siddhe 'pyevaṃvidhe vyavahāre vastu tāvadabādhitameveti yaduktaṃ tanna yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2795: [30] ye sāṃkhyādayaḥ pradhāneśvarādikaṃ manvānāḥ pradhāneśvarādibhyo vastūnāmutpādamabhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2796: teṣāmapi mataṃ svato vā parato vā utpādapakṣe pṛthakpṛtham doṣābhidhānānnaiva yuktarūpamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2797: anye ye kadācit svātantryena ubhayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2799: apare ca ye tāvat - 'ubhayātmakasya vastunaḥ pramāṇaviruddhatvānna ko 'pi tadabhyupagacchatīti hetoḥ ubhayata utpattiṃ dūṣayitvā bhavantaḥ kevalamātmānameva mohayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2801: te tāvad vidvāṃsaḥ svayaṃ śāstrāṇāmaparijñānāt śabdārthayośca samyaganavagamāt [kevalaṃ] śabdaśa upahasanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2802: kecana tāvat kaṇṭakāditīkṣṇatādṛṣṭāntena sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'hetuta utpadyanta iti kathayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2803: tatra vastūnāṃ paramārthato 'hetuta utpattiṃ sādhayatāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntastāvannaiva siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2808: anenaiva teṣāṃ taikṣṇyādīnāmapi niścitatvānna ko 'pi [dharmaḥ] ahetuta utpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2809: evaṃ kādācitkatvāt sarveṣāmeteṣāṃ vastūnāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ niścitameva anapekṣitasya tu sadā aviśeṣāttasya kādācitkatvaṃ nopapadyata eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2814: ahetukatve sati sarvatra abhinnatvāt kaṇkādiṣvapi tīkṣṇatāyā nirdhāraṇaṃ na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2816: ye bījādayaste loke kāryakāraṇātmakatvena pratyakṣataḥ siddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2818: api ca, hetutaḥ sādyasya sādhanāvasare anyataḥ [hetataḥ] utpatteḥ [siddheḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2823: ato 'hetuvādī khalu vyavahāre pratyakṣādibhirbādhitatvād vidvadbhiḥ sāvadhānatayā pariharttavya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2825: te yathā avicāraramaṇīyatvena prasiddhāstathā teṣāmaniṣedhād anutpattirityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2831: atasteṣu vyāpterutpatteḥ samyaṅ nivṛttyā tasyāpi [sasvabhāvatvasya] nivṛttiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2835: sā khalu [utpattiḥ] tadvijñāne tathaivāvabhāsata ityapi kathanamyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2837: tatrāpi paramārthatastathākāro naiva sambhavīti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2839: tadutpattyā sasvabhāvatvādīnāṃ vyaptatve 'pi utpattau satyāṃ samyaksvabhāvo naiva niyatarūpeṇa sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2840: vyāpakasāmīpye sarvavyāpyāṇāṃ sāmīpyaṃ navaśyaṃbhāvīti niścitamityuktameva pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2842: paramarthato na kasminnapyutpattiḥ pravartata iti sādhitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2843_0: yanna kaiścidapi pratyayaiḥ samutpadyate tad vastu kutaḥ prādurbhavatīti kathayadbhirabhivyaktimātrameva
SA10ksmadhlu:2843_1: ato 'naikāntika eva heturiti cet tatasyāpi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt tyājyamevaitaditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2844_0: atha pratyayairvastu abhivyajyata eveti cettadā ki sā abhivyaktiḥ svalakṣaṇopacayasvabhāvā
SA10ksmadhlu:2844_1: vā tadāvaraṇasaṃkṣayātmiokā vā indriyaiḥ sukṛtā vā tadviṣayakavijñānotpattilakṣaṇā
SA10ksmadhlu:2845: tatra naiva tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kathamapi yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2847: yadā anupacayasvabhāvaḥ svato vinaśya abhivyañcakapratyayairutpadyate tadā ekasyāparasyānupacayasvabhāvasyotpādavaśāt svalakṣaṇopacayo bhavatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2848: na, tatpūrvasvabhāvo yadi na nirudhyeta tadā dvau parasparāvirudhau upacayāpacayasvabhāvau niryuktitayā ekasminneva svīkāryau syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:2849: yadyapūrvaḥ kaścana svabhāvo notpadyate tadā abhivyañcakāḥ pratyayāstāvannirarthakaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2855: tadā sarve te pratyayā ye yadā arthamabhivyañcinti tadā ananyārthabhūtā kriyā tatra naiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2857: nityasya bhāvasya tvāvaraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāṇāmavināśād anutpādācca kadāpi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2862: yadi nāsti sa samartho vā svavijñānavijñeyo vā tadā svahetuvikalatayā tadvijñānotpattireva na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2864: yathā āvaraṇasaṃkṣaye tathā vijñānotpattāvapi avighnāpādanasvabhāvo 'pi kriyāyāṃ naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2865: asāmarthyāt tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvābhāvācca abhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayairāvaraṇaṃ kriyata ityasyāpi nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtameva [pūrvam] /
SA10ksmadhlu:2867: yadi sāmarthayamabhyupagamyate tadā āvaraṇakārake satyapi avikalahetoḥ sadbhāvāt sadaiva vijñānotpattisambhavād vyañjakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ kriyā nirarthikaiva syāt /
