SA10ksmadhlu:2868: ato nityasya tāvadakiñcikaratvāt kathamapyāvaraṇaṃ na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2869: anityatā tu kadāpi kenāpi hetuviśeṣeṇa vijñānānutpādakasyānyasya kṣaṇasyotpādād āvriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2873: yadi tadanyārthabhūtaṃ tadā sukṛtatvaṃ naiva yuktiyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2876: kasminnapi vastuni kenāpi kimapi karaṇaṃ tāvannaiva sambhavamiti [pūrvaṃ] nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2877: indriyaiḥ sukṛtatve 'pi yadi abhivyañcakairbhāvaiḥ tadindriyavijñānotpādāsāmarthyam athavā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvāsattvaṃ tadā tadvijñānotpattirasambhavinī,
SA10ksmadhlu:2879: yadi vidyata eva sāmarthyaṃ tadvijñeyasvabhāvo vā tadā indriyaiḥ sukṛtakatvataḥ pūrvameva tasmin [viṣaye] vijñānotpādasya prasañgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2881: atastamin viṣaye vijñānotpādalakṣaṇamapi na saṅgataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2882: yato hyevaṃ tad vyaṅgyaṃ vastvapi yadi asamarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyavabhāvaṃ vāpi nāsti tadā vijñānotpāde 'pi na pad [vastu] tasya [vijñānasya] viṣayaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2883_0: yadi [tad vastu] samarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvaṃ vā syāt tadā svasvabhāvavat
SA10ksmadhlu:2883_1: sāmīpyāt tatsattāmatreṇaiva vijñānasya samutpādo bhaviṣyatītyato na tena vyañjakavijñānotpādaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:2884: api ca, bhavatāṃ tāvanmate sarvesāṃ vastūnāṃ jāyataḥ sadaivāvatiṣṭhanta iti hetostatra [vastuṣu] vyaṅgyavyañjakādīnāmapi sadā avasthitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2890: nityasya ca sarvasāmarthyavirahiotatvānnaiva hi vastutvaṃ kathamapyupapadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2896: te 'pi kramayogapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt sarvasāmarthyaśūnyā eveti pūrvamapi [bahudhā] nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2902: ityevaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo ye sarvasāmarthyaśūnyāsteṣāṃ vandhyāputrādyabhinnatve 'pi ye khalu tān vastutvena parikalpayanti ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2905: pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo yadi kasyāpi jñānasya viṣayāstadā avaśyaṃ te hetutvenaṅgīkaraṇīyāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2910: anupakāritve 'pi yadi vijñānena vijñeyasvabhāvasya abhāvād viṣayatvaṃ kalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2911: tathā sati yadi vijñānaṃ vijñeyasvabhāvamanusaratīti tadā tadvijñānasyāpi tadanusaraṇena nityatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2913: yadi sarvajñajñānaṃ taditi na kasyāpi vastunaḥ sāmīpyamiti kalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2916: yena kāraṇena tato vibhaktaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādiṃ ye jñeyatvenopacaranti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2921: vandhyāputrādisadṛśe tadabhitnne 'pi yadi vastviti nāma prajñapyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2923: kintuṃ kathaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'hetukā iti nocyata ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2932: yadi tāni kramaśa ekasiddhinisedhāmyām aparaniṣedhasiddhibhāñji na syustadā asadeva syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2933: phalata ekasya niṣedha evāparasya siddhiriti hetoḥ kathaṃ tāvadanabhidheyaṃ vastvityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2934: anyathā [yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā] anabhidheyatvāt sarvāṇyeva vastunyanabhidheyāni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2935: phalataḥ svaparoditānām aśeṣavastuviśeṣāṇāṃ vilopasambhavād mahātmabhirvajrakaṇādiyukticatuṣṭayasyābhidhād ebhyo mārgebhyo
SA10ksmadhlu:2937: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2938: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
SA10ksmadhlu:2940: ityevaṃ sarve dharmā nirātmāna iti sādhyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:2941: ata eva bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāsūtre vastuṣu nityānityagrāhasya tāvanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2946: yadā tad rūpaṃ sadeva nāsti tadā tannityābhidhānasya tu kathaiva kā? ityuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2948: ata evātrāpi parataḥ kāryotpāde tāvat ko virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2952: satkāryotpādaniṣedhāryamapi bhavatāṃ savidhe nāsti ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaścetyādi yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2954: tathā hi - kiṃ tat yat sadityucyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2955: aṃśaistāvanniraṃśasya siddhirasambhavinīti yasya svabhāvaḥ sarvātmanā niṣpannaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2956: yaśca niṣpannasvabhāva iti tasya paraiḥ[hetupratyayaiḥ] apūrva ityākhyaṃ bhedaṃ kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2962: vicchinnamātre sādhye tathaiva ca hetornideśe na te abhūtadharmito viruddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2974: sa hetusannidhānāt pūrvamapi tathaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ 'hetubhirutpannaḥ' iti kathayituṃ śakyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2980: tadā paścādapi kathaṃ sa satsvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2982: yaśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sa tadviruddhadharmiṇi kathaṃ nāma yuktaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2983: yathā amūrtadhārmāntarbhūtaṃ tāvadākāśaṃ kathaṃ nāma mūrtaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2984: utpattyākhyo hi prasiddhaḥ satsvabhāvastāvad asatsvabhāvaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ hi nāma paramārthato 'bhāvena samprayuktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2987_0: pṛthaksāmarthyavataḥ kasyāpi bhāvātmakasya hetoranantaraṃ prādurbhāvasya sampratibhāsābhāvāt
SA10ksmadhlu:2987_1: taddhetorasadutpadyata iti loke utpattiviśeṣaviṣayikāyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ abhidhānasya
SA10ksmadhlu:2988: vyavahāramātreṇa tu vastusattve bādhāleśo 'pi naiva sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2995: ataḥ 'asadutpadyate' iti yadktaṃ tadabhāvato bhāvasiddhiriti naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2998: yadyetad vastu hetoḥ sāmīpyāt pūrvamudbhūtaṃ nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3000: yadi tadā kiñcidapi nāsti tadā tat kadācid vastutvenābhidhāsyata iticintā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3001: yadi nāsti vastunaḥ kimapi bhāvātmakamastitvaṃ tadā tasya svabhāvo 'sadeveti suspaṣtamabhidhāsyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3006: pūrvaṃ nāsīdityasadutpattervyavahārasyāpi hetupratyayābhāsāḥ kathaṃ samyagityabhidhātuṃ śakyāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3008: yato hi yadi nāstyanyastadā abhūtādanyo bhūto nāsti satsamīpavarttyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3013: ekasmin krameṇa sattvāsattve aviruddheityabhidhānamapi naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3015: yadi samakāle te aviruddhe tadā krameṇāpi kathaṃ te na tathā,
SA10ksmadhlu:3017: bhinnadharmiṇi viruddhalakṣaṇasyāviruddhatve 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva krameṇāpi tad bhavituṃ śakroti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3020: anyathā parairapi pradhānādīnāṃ kramaśo mahadādigaṇe parivartanam abhivyaktim vā upakalpayatāṃ vyaktāvyaktādidharmavirodhaḥ kathamabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3021: krameṇa vastūnāmutpādakeṣu īśvarādiṣu kathaṃ nāma samarthāsamarthādivirodhodbhāvanaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3022: ye kecana parvatakāyavajrādīn dṛḍhasvabhāvān teṣāṃ śītoṣmādyavasthābhedena kramaśo bhedaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3023: te 'pi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sisādhayiṣavaḥ kathaṃ krameṇa prādurbhavatsu teṣu śītoṣmādiviruddhatvamabhidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3025: bhūtvā cābhāvatvenāvabhāsanta iti vicāraṇād ekasmin kramaśaḥ sadasattvaviruddhatvena vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti kathayantīti cennedaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3026: yato hi tāmrādiṣvevaṃ dāḍharyamārdavaśaityauṣṇyādīni krameṇa dṛśyanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3031: yato hi māyāsvapnādisamā alīkā api [padārthāḥ] abhūtvā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3033: kintu svabhāvataḥ sadasatostu krameṇāpi tayoḥ sadasatorvirodha eva / tadyathā -
SA10ksmadhlu:3039: āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre 'pi pūrvaṃ rāgādīn sattvenābhyupagamya punarasattvenāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vaināśikataiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3040: kāryakāraṇabhāvo yadi paramārthata syāttadā evamabhidadhānānāṃ [sā] dṛṣṭistāvat samyag mārgānusaraṇād muktimārgānukūlaiva strānnatvananukūlā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3041: ato laṅkāvatārasūtre yaduktaṃ tadapyaviruddhamevaṃ, tathā hi -
SA10ksmadhlu:3045: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3046: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:3049: pratiniyatasāmarthyato viruddhamapi svabhāvaṃ kartuṃ naiva pāryate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3050: tathā sati śaśaśṛṃṅgādīnāmapyutpādaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi vidvāṃso bruvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3051: ato hetūnāṃ niyatasāmarthyena vyavasthāpi niyatā bhavedityabhidhānamapi tāvadasambaddhameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3052: saṃvṛtāvapi khalvasata utpattiḥ kathaṃ na vitudhyata iti vicāraṇāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3055: api ca, yā khalu vastūnāmutpattiḥ saṃvṛtimāyāvadavasthitā,
SA10ksmadhlu:3061: ata eva sarvāṇi khalu vastūni māyāvadeva vyavasthitāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:3063: sato 'sataścānutpannatvāt sarve dharmā anutpannā evetyanekadhā sadasatorniṣedhaṃ kṛtvā anutpāda eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3064: bhagavata 'pi parikalpisvabhāvamabhipretya sadasatorutpattivirodho vyavasthāpitaḥ na tu tattvata ityevaṃ yeṣāṃ kathanaṃ tadapyagre 'bhidhāsyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3065: yo hi vastvātmā paramārthato 'nupanna so 'pi tattvata utpanna ityevaṃbhūto yo parikalpitaḥ svabhāvastamapi ye parikalpitasvabhāvatvenābhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3067_1: sa parikalpitasvabhāva iti cintyate tadā parikalpitātmakayoḥ sadastoryathā utpattivirodhastathaiva
SA10ksmadhlu:3068: tattvatastu utpatteḥ sadasadākārātirikttvena anyākāratayānutpannatvāt sādhāraṇameva taditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3069: ato yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa paramārthataḥ śūnyaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3071: nāstyayaṃ heturanaikāntiko 'pi yadi viparyayastadā yathoktadoṣadūṣitāni pramāṇānyapi sambhaveyuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3072: yo hi hetupratyayānapekṣya samutpadyate tasya kṛtaka eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3075: ya eva kṛtakastasya naiva prakṛtyā svabhāvo yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3080: bhūtvā ca vigaccati tau [svabhāvau] parasparaviruddhatvādasambaddhāviti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3084: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10ksmadhlu:3085: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //“
SA10ksmadhlu:3086: nityānityasvabhāvayorupakalpitatvād vastūnām antadvayadarśane prasaṅgamāpādayitum uttam āryaśrīmālāsūtre -
SA10ksmadhlu:3089: 'anityāḥ saṃkārā iti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syāducchedadṛṣṭiḥ sāsya syānna samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3090: nityaṃ nirvāṇamiti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syācchaśvatadṛṣṭiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3104: na hi jñānajñeyābhyāṃ bhinno vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3105_1: yujyata eveti ye kathayantītyanenāpi [kathanena] naiva [hetoḥ] viruddhatvaṃ sādhayituṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3107: māyādiṣu hi mithyātvena [tatra] naiva pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3112: yato 'smābhirapi paramārthata utpattimabhyupagamya naiva hetornideśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3114: na hi siddhāntāpekṣayā dharmihetvādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyata iti tu pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3115: yadi māyādayo vyavahāreṇāpyanutpannā ityabhyupagamyate tadedaṃ lokasyāpi nirvartakatvād asmābhirasyāṃ nivṛttau prayatno naivāstheyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3116: ko 'pi svasthamanāḥ puruṣo yadi 'yathā māyādīnāṃ pratyayā mantrauṣadhyādayaśca dṛśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3118: tattu teṣāṃ [kathanaṃ] viduṣāṃ kṛte 'tyantaṃ hāsyāspadamapamānakaraṃ ceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3121: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3122: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:3124: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattannasti svabhāvataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3125: niḥsvabhāvā hi te bhāvāḥ kadācit sambhavanti na //
SA10ksmadhlu:3127: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattacchāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3132: [31] yadi vināśādayo hi vikalpāḥ paramārthata utpāttau bādhitā ityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3138: yadi yuktyā te prasidhyanti tadā paramārthata eva bhaveyuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3142: na hi pramāṇabādhitā mithyāsvabhāvā api māyādayo loke 'prasiddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3143: ato vastusthitaṃ bhrāntaṃ vijñānamapi māyādivalloke prasiddhamityucyamānamapi na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3144: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva māyādisvamiyucyamānamapi na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3145: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva bhāyādisvabhāvaḥ sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3147: māyādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi jñānasya tadabhinnatayā gṛhītāmithyākāratvenāvabhāsitatvāt tadapi tadvanmithyaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3148: anyathā satyāsatyasvabhāvayostāvat ko hi sambandhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3152: yadi nāstyātmanā virodhastadā kathaṃ sa pramāṇena sādhayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3154: sa ca pramāṇaiḥ sidhyatyapītyucyate tadā sādhananirbharaḥ saḥ kathamasvīkāryaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3157: api ca, antarjñeyavādināṃ matānusāraṃ yadadvayajñāne ākāradvayaṃ sāgaraparvatabhūmijalādikaṃ tadaṃśatayopacaryate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3161: na ca prativādibhiḥ saha vivādā api jāyeran /
SA10ksmadhlu:3163: na ca satyātmakasya jñānasya pratibhāsamārnairmithyākāraiḥ saha kaścanāpi sambandhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3165: na hi bhavatāṃ mate virodho dṛśyata ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣatastattvadarśitvasambhavād muktyatthināṃ kṛte tattvabhāvānāyāḥ pratyatno nirarthaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3166: yadyevaṃ cintyate yad 'bhrānte vijñāne vividhāvabhāsānāṃ viruddhatve 'pi virodho naiva vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3170: yadyevaṃ na syāt tadā tadanumānaṃ vastubalapravṛttameva na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3172: tatra tāvattattvānyatvādivirodho 'pi nābhidhīyate ' - yadyevaṃ vicāryate tadā sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇabhāvasya kathaṃ virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3173: mithyābhūte tasmin vastubalapravṛttānumānaviṣayatvāsambhavāt sa viruddha iti nābhidheya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3176: yato hi bhavatāṃ tathāvidhena virodhena mithyātvasiddhireva syānnatvavabhāsanirākṛtiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3178: yadi sa mithyātvena prasādhyate tadāsmākameva pakṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:3179: yato vayamapi kāryakāraṇadeśakālahetupratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ satyāmapyapekṣāyāṃ [taṃ] pramāṇabādhitaṃ ca mithyā caiva manyāmahe,
SA10ksmadhlu:3181: tathāvidhavirodhakaraṇena bhavadbhiranyeṣāṃ vastugrahanivṛttiḥ kathaṃ nāma na svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3182: kintu nirdoṣābhidhānāttāvad bhavatāmeva bādhā syāt asmākaṃ tu pramāṇānāmapravṛttirapi nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3183: anyathā kathaṃ nāma saṃvṛtau sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3184: yathaiva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sidhyati tathaiva samyaktvena abhyupagatavatāṃ mithyāropanivṛttaye kevalaṃ vayaṃ pramāṇāni prayuñjamahe, nānyatra /
SA10ksmadhlu:3185: pramāṇānāṃ prayoge satyapi naiva pratyakṣabādhā pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3197: yadhevaṃ na syāttadā spaṣṭāvabhāsitayā bāhyārthasya pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi na sa pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3198: phalata ekānekasvabhāvavirahitatve 'pi na sa niḥsvabhāvaḥ sidhyatītiḥ sidhyatīti syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3199: taimirikādiṣu keśamaśakādīnāmavabhāse 'pi pratyakṣato virodhānna kenāpi teṣāṃ mithyātvam asvīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3200: ataḥ svānurūpakāryakāranabhāvena anādikālikaparamparāagatānāṃ sarveṣāṃ janmanāṃ deśākālahetuviśeṣāpekṣitatve 'pi māyotpādavat saṃvṛtāveva vyavasthā kriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3202: teṣāṃ yadā samakālikāsamakālikavyavasthāyāṃ nāsti virodhastadā akṣaṇikatvādidoṣā api teṣu naiva prarvatante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3204: māyāsvapnādisadṛśeṣu dharmeṣu paramārthatastāvat kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvādayo naiva hi yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3206: ye rūpasya nityatve 'nityatve vā ācaranti te nācaranti prajñāpāramitāyām tat kathamiti?
SA10ksmadhlu:3207: tad rūpaṃ yadā nāsti tathā sat tadā kathaṃ tannityamanityaṃ vā syāt /“
SA10ksmadhlu:3209: katipayeṣvanyeṣu [sutreṣu] yā khalu saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatā deśitā,
SA10ksmadhlu:3210: sā prasādasaṃskārebhyo mānasamudvignaṃ kṛtvā kramaśo nairātmye praveśāyaiva deśitā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3215: yadi māyādivadaṅkurotpādādiṣu bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyamabhyupagamyata iti cintyate tadā vastunaḥ svīkṛtireva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3216: yato hyevaṃ yāni sāṃvṛtikāni bījākhyāni tāni sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttānyevābhidheyāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:3217: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā kathaṃ bhavadbhirlokāgavirodhaparihāraḥ kartuṃ śakyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:3218: vayaṃ tu yattāvat sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇebhyaḥ śaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttaṃ tadeva vastviti kathayāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3219: 'yadi bhavantastathāvidhamapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmnābhidhātumabhilaṣante tadā saharṣaṃ bravantu,
SA10ksmadhlu:3222_0: yato hyevaṃ svapnādau gajāśvagnibhūmivṛṣabhādayo mithyābhāvā ye vividhārthakriyāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3222_1: kurvāṇāḥ parasparabhinnaśarīrānugatā dṛśyante te yathaiva bhinnadeśakālavasthāsu
SA10ksmadhlu:3222_2: dṛśyante tathaiva kiṃ sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttakāyāḥ santi?
SA10ksmadhlu:3224: te yadyekāntena vinivṛttakāyāstadā tevāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3226: tarhi kathaṃ bhavantaḥ prasiddhivirodhasya parihāraṃ kariṣyanti?
SA10ksmadhlu:3227: yadyucyeta yathāvabhāsaṃ tatsvabhāvo nāvatiṣṭhatītyataḥ pratītyasamutpannatvājjñānasvabhāvatvena vastutaḥ santīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:3232: yadi jñānasvabhāvastāvad śuddhasphaṭika iva niraṃśaḥ kkacanāpyanavasthito nīlādivividhasvabhāveṣvanavabhāsamāna ityabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3233: tadā svapnādiṣu gajāśvādīni vastuni tatsvabhāvatvena na samudbhaviṣyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3235: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā tathāvabhāso naiva śakyarūpaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3236: ata eva vayaṃ jñānasvabhāvātītaṃ viparītākāreṇāvabhāsitaṃ mithyātvāllaukikamabhyupagacchāmastathā parikalpitasvabhāvenocyamānameva vastutvena bhrānto viṣaya iti kathayāmaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3239: evaṃ vastvātmanā prasiddhamapi pramāṇena yathāvat sfuṭamavabhāsite 'pi paramārthatayā vastusvabhāvatvena na vyavasthāpayāmaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3241_1: nivṛttamanivṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ naiva praviśatītyucyeta tadevaṃ yathoktaḥ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:3242: yathā - māyāsvapnādyabhinno vastusvabhāvaḥ pramāṇena suspaṣṭīkṛtaḥ ayamapi paramārtha iti prajñapyate tadā saharṣaṃ prajñapyatāmutsavaścānubhūyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:3245_1: malaviśuddhayarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca pravṛttyarthaṃ ye paramārthanukūlāṃ yathāprasiddhāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3248: [yato hi] te naiva santi paramārthataḥ saditi tu pūrvamevāveditam
SA10ksmadhlu:3252: āgame 'uyuktam - “etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharmaṃ nirvāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3254: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi vastuno yadi niyatadeśakālādyavabhāso bhavatīti kathaṃ na śaśaśṛṅgādayo 'pyavabhāsanta iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:3256: yato hi keśādivanmithyāvabhāse 'pi kimiti keśādīnāmeva mithyāvabhāsaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3258: yadi timirādihetupratyayādīnāṃ pratīniyatasāmarthyena tathā pratiniyatatvamityucyeta tadā asadvastuni kathaṃ nāma hetupratyayādīnāṃ pratiniyatasāmarthyamiti kathayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3260: tadā tathaiva apareṣvapi pratiniyatahetupratyayatvena pratiniyatasāmarthye 'pi kimiti naiva tathā vyavasthā svīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3262: tathā sati taimirikadṛṣṭakeśādīnāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi pūrvamevāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3263: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā taimirikairadhyālambitānāṃ mithyākeśāṃdīnāṃ hetupratyayā api kathaṃ nāma niyatāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3264: taimirikakeśādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvenāpi satyatvaṃ naiva yujyata iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3265: api ca, yadi jñānasvabhāvaḥ satyatvena siddhaṃ syāttadā keśādayo na tato bhinnā iti teṣāmapi satyatvenāvabodhaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3267: keśādayastu mithyātvena lokena pramāṇena ca siddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3268: ato jñānamapi keśādimithyāsvabhāvenābhinnatvāt tathaiva mithyāmātramiti kathaṃ keśādīnāṃ tatsvabhāvatvena satyatvaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3269: yathā sarvaṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni tathaiva saṃvṛtāvapyutpannāni bhavituṃ na śaknuvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3270: tathā hi - ye tāvat paramārthato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ saṃvṛtāvapi notpādaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3271: yathā - śaśaśṛṅgādaya iti ye bruvanti teṣāṃ māyādibhiranaikāntikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3275: ataḥ paramārthato 'sato yadi saṃvṛtāvapyasattvaṃ tadā saṃvṛtisatyasyaiva vināśaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3278: saṃvṛtāvapi adṛṣṭotpadāḥ śaśaśṛṅgādayo na tathāvidhakarmaṇāṃ sañcayābhāvāna tu paramārthasvabhāvarahitatvād,
SA10ksmadhlu:3280: na hetupratyayanirbharatāmātreṇa vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ māyādimithyāvastūnāṃ hetupratyayasamūhabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3281: na hi darśanamātreṇa vastūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ sanniti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3283: ato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ spaṣṭataḥ siddhatve 'pi pramāṇamārgasya jñānābhāvad ye 'nyato dūṣitān nirākartumabhilaṣante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3288: evaṃvādinaṃ kaścit 'kathaṃ nāma ekasmādekasyānutpattibodhaḥ' iti pṛcchatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:3293: yadi kecana' īśvarādinā ekena jagad utpadyata iti kathayantīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:3295: yadyekamādekasyotpattiriti tadā sā nityād vā anityād vā bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:3296: na nityāt, tasya anutpannāvasthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvāparakālavad madhye 'pi utpādakatvavirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3301: nityatāyā hānisadbhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tasyotpādakatvaṃ vistareṇa nirākriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3305: na hi nityānityābhyāṃ vyatiriktastasya kaścanotpādaka iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3306: ye cānyaiḥ [vādibhiḥ] ekasvabhāvā īśvarādayo jagato 'sya hetavo manyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3309: ata ekasmādekasyotpattirna bhavatīti kathanakāle bhrāntatayā īśvarādikaṃ yannirdiśanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3311: na hi īśśvarādayo hetutvena astitvabhājo bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3313: nityastāvat sarvasāmarthyaśūnya iti ca pūrvameva prasādhitatatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3316: yato hi tato yadi bhinnasantānavartināṃ phalānāmutpattirbhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3317: tadā tasya anyasajātīyakṣaṇasya pratisandhānābhāvād dvitīya eva kṣaṇe samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3318_0: yadyevaṃ tadā tataḥ sadā vijātīyaphalānāmutpattikāle sarveṣāṃ pūrvasajātīyakṣaṇānāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3318_1: paścādvartini kṣaṇe pratisandhānābhāvād ye tāvadanityasvabhāvā īśvarādisaṃjñakā jagato
SA10ksmadhlu:3321: hetorabhāvena tasyotpatterasambhavāt athavā sampūrnameva jagat tadvadahetukameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3322: yato hi pūrvamapi paścādapi taddhetutvena [sarvathā] kimapi nāstīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3326: tadā sa eva kathaṃ na tasya phalaṃ vā tadutpanno veti kalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3329: abhinnasantāne vidyamāno sa heturanādikālāt tasyāmeva santatau pravṛtta eveti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3330: naivānyasantāne vidyamānaḥ sannutpattikāraka iti kalpyate tadā tasmin paramārthato 'samakālatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3331: anyatra ca sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirapi naiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ bahuśo nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3332: ataccāpi hetubhedasya abhinnakārake prasaṅgaśca paścāt pratipādayiṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3334: yadyante cakṣurādayastāvat phalasyaikasya niyatotpādakā iti manyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3336: yato hi cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi yadā svavijñānamutpadayanti tadā sajātīyānyakṣaṇāni notpādayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3341: yadyevaṃ tadā hetubhedo bhedaniyāmako naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3342: yo hi ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3345: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ahetukānyeva tāvad vastūni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3346: tatra hetubhede 'pi yadi phalabhedo na syāttadā hetorbhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedau na kṛtau syātām,
SA10ksmadhlu:3349: itthaṃ naiva te samūhād vyatiriktāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3350: naiva ca te samūhāt pṛtham kartuṃ śakyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3351: parantu parasparabhinnasvabhāvāt pratyekasmādutpattisāmarthayavato yadi phalamudbhuyate tadā abhinnameva kathaṃ nāmodbhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3353: na tvanekaphalotpādana ityevaṃ cettadapi na yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3354: yadyevaṃ tadā sajātīyaphalapratīsandhānābhāvād dvītiye tāvat kṣaṇe cakṣurādisantānānoccheda eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3355: yadi teṣu sajātīyakṣaṇotpāde sāmarthyamityucyate tadā tadanyadeva tāvad vastu syāttataśca sāmarthyameva hetuḥ syānna na khalu vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:3360: yadi te svabhāvabhūtaṃ samarthamuparkurvantīti manyate tadā phalamapi tathaiva kiṃ na kurvantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3364: ataḥ kathaṃ nāma phalaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3369: ataḥ phalasya sajātīya vijātīyatayorbhedo naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3370: hetubhedastrāvat [phalasya] bhedako na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃvidhasya prasaṅgasya ko hyarthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3371: yadi khaṇḍaśo notpādayatītyarthastadā vastusvabhāvasya niraṃśatvād aśaṃtaścotpādasyāsvīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ nāma prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3373: yadi viśeṣako [bhedako] na bhavatītyevamartho gṛhyate tadā asiddhamevaitat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3374: hetubhistāvadanekebhyo vijātīyaphalebhyo viparītameva jantaya ityabhidhānamapi naiva yuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3375: yato hyekasya aṃśata utpatterasambhavāditi prasaṅgo naivocyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3376: parantu bhavanto ye vastuṣu parasparaṃ vyatirekaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā manvate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3378: yadi vividhahetūnaṅgīkṛtyāpi phalamekavidhameva svīkṛyate tadā bhrāntisadbhāvād vastūnāṃ tāvad bhedo vividhahetubhirakṛta eva syādityevaṃ prasaṅgo nūnamabhidhānīyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3383: tadā tebhya utpadyaṃ sajātīyaṃ phalaṃ vijātīyaṃ ca naiva parasparanivṛttaṃ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:3385: yadi hetavaste nivṛttisvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ sajātīyaphalanāṃ bhedakā api bhaviṣyantītyucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3386: tadā tathaiva te sāmānyaphale 'pi kathaṃ na bhedakāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3387: yato hi tatra sarve ekaikā hetavo bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3388: ye tāvadekotpādakasvabhāvā eva te tato viparītaṃ kamapyanyaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3389: yato hi te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttyā anyārtha iva bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3391: punaste parasparanivṛttasvabhāvāḥ kintu naiva te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3399: ekasvabhāvasyābhāvo naiva tasya svabhāvo bhavituṃ śaknoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3401: tenaiva tatphalaṃ niṣpādanīyamiti yaduktaṃ tatra kā yuktiriti cet sāṃkhyaireva tatsamādhānaṃ vidheyamiti śobhanaṃ pratibhāti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3402: yato hi te khalu bhinnabhinnasvabhāvaṃ jagaditi pratipādayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3403_0: atasteṣāṃ yattatra grahaṇaṃ tannivṛtyarthameva ācāryeṇa bhinnavastunirdeśakānāṃ kṛte
SA10ksmadhlu:3403_1: vyavahāravaśāduktam tāni [vastūni] pratītyasamutpannatayā naiva paramārthata ekārthāni
SA10ksmadhlu:3403_2: nāpi ca bhinnarthānīti manvānāṃ kṛte naiva kimapyuktamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3404: teṣāṃ tāvadanusāraṃ tu māyāsadṛśatvāt sarveṣu teṣu na kimapyekaṃ vastu bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3405: api ca, yadi vastuṣu paramārthataḥ svabhavadvayam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3407: aparaśca svabhāvalakṣaṇastadā nivṛtte 'pyasmin svabhāvenaivotpādakalakṣaṇastāvannivartata ityuttaraṃ khalu samīcīnaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3408: yasmin samaye sarva evotpādakasvabhāvastasmin samaye yadi te parasparanivṛttasvabhāvā api tadā utpādakasvabhāvato nivṛttatvāt kathaṃ nāmotpādakāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3409_0: teṣāmayameva svabhāvo yat svabhāvabhede 'pi ekamutpādayanti viruddhasvabhāve 'pi
SA10ksmadhlu:3409_1: ca sati naiva parīkṣāyogyā iti yadi bhavadbhirucyate tadā pādau prasārya tathātāparīkṣātaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:3409_2: parāṅmukhabuddhayo ye vyavahāramātramanusaranti te sukhenāsituṃ śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3410: ye tu tathātāparīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtabuddhayasteṣāṃ kṛte tathaiva sukhāsanaṃ naiva yuktarūpam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3411: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā īśvarādistāvadekaḥ sannapi svabhāvabhede 'pi ca sati krameṇa yugapad vā vicitrasyāsya jagato heturupeṇa naiva kathamapi viruddho bhaviṣyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3413: svabhāvabhede 'pi nāsti parīkṣāyogya ityabhidadhatāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāmottaraṃ dattaṃ syāt?
SA10ksmadhlu:3414_0: tenaiva phalamutpādanīyamiti pratipādayatāṃ tatra kā yuktiriti ye kathayanti teṣāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3414_1: kṛte agnyādikamapekṣyotpadyamāno dhūmastāvad śakramūrdhato 'uputpadyata iti kathanaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3416: vyavahāre 'pi ekasamūhāntargato yadyekaphalasyotpādako bhavettadā naiva viruddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3417: kintu samūhāntargatastu viruddha evetyevaṃ kathayadbhiḥ saha nāsti kaścana bhedaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3421: samuho 'pi bhinnaḥ svabhāvataścotpanna ityevamabhidadhānaiḥ saha ko virodha iti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3422: tatra yathā ekasamūhamāśrityotpadyamānaṃ phalaṃ samūhāntareṇāpyutpadyate tadā tenotpādyasya svabhāvasyāniyatatvād ahetuka ityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3423: tathaiva ekasminneva samūhe vijñānādayo yadā ekahetumapekṣyāpi tadvilakṣaṇahetuta utpadyante tadā kimityahetukatāyāḥ prasaṅgo noktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3424: hetoryathātmakena prayogeṇa nirduṣṭāt svabhāvaviśeṣād hetubhedo bhedakaśca viruddhāveva syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:3425: yato hi cakṣurādinā bhinnasvabhāvena cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ phalānāmutpattikāle sākṣād bhedābhāve 'pi pratītisvabhāvād rūpādayaḥ pṛthagviṣayatvena niyatā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3427: te cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samantarapratyayena ca pratītisvabhāvāḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3433: viṣayeṇa ca samantarapratyayena cāpi pṛthaktayā viṣayagrahaṇaṃ naiva niyatam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3434: evaṃvidhayā niyatavyavasthayā niścayena hetubhedo bhedaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3435: bheda eva bhinnaviśeṣa ityasau vicāro yadi vyavahāratayā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthamevocyate tadā tu sutarāṃ yajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3437: atha ye tāvad bhedāstee aprajñaptimātrātmakā vā nivṛttiviśeṣeṇa prajñaptisvabhāvātmakā vā?
SA10ksmadhlu:3438: yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastadā vijñānasya ālambanādasvabhāvādabhinnatvena tathaivānekatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3441_0: tathaivābhinne 'pi rūpādibhya utpadyata ityucyata iti cedekasmin ekadā parasparaviruddhāvutpādānutpādau
SA10ksmadhlu:3441_1: kathaṃ nāma na viruddhau syātāmityayaṃ doṣo naiva yujyatāmiti vicārya ye viśeṣān
SA10ksmadhlu:3441_2: vijñānato bhinnārthatvena kalpayanti teṣāṃ tadā vijñānamahetukaṃ syād anyasminneva
SA10ksmadhlu:3443: yadi prajñaptisvabhāva iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ svīkriyate tadāpi vijñānasyāhetukatvaṃ prasajyata eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3445: prajñaptyātmakatve kasyāpi yogo naiva bhavatītyataḥ sarveṣāmahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3446: phalataḥ paramārthato 'nekebhya ekasya phalasyotpattirnaiva sarvathā yujayata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3450: tadā hetubhedābhāve 'pi phalasya bhinnatvāt phalasya tāvad bhedābhedau kathaṃ nāhetukāviti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3451: yena khalu kāraṇena tatra phalāntarotpattimattve nāstyanyaḥ [kaścana] viśeṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3453: ato hettuatāvat svabhāvapracyuto bhūtvā phalaṃ notpādayatīti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3454: tathāpi tasmin hetvātmakatve bhedābhāvāt tannirvṛte phale 'pi tāvad bhedo na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3458: atastasyāḥ parihāraṃ kartuṃ śakyata ityabhidhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3462: yad yathā dṛśyate tattathaiva sadityabhiniviśamānānāṃ kevalaṃ mithyākalpanānāṃ nirākaraṇāya svapna iva sādhyamānatvānnāsti tāvad virodho 'pīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3463: api ca, cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ yānyanekasmādutyadyamānāni dṛśyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3464: teṣāṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvastāvadekatvena naiva kathamapi siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3466: vividho 'pi svabhāvo yadyekaḥ syāttadā sarveṣāmevaikadravyatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3469: ekasya cānekaṣāṃ ca vastūnāṃ paramārthata utpattistāvat kutra samavalokyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:3471: ekaikasya phalasya stāvadanaikairhetubhiḥ kriyamāṇatvādayamapi pakṣastāvadanekasmādekasyaivotpattipakṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3476: ato nāstyayamasiddho heturapi koṭīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo 'pi kaścanotpattipakṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3480: ācāryo 'pi saṃvṛtau kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitiṃ svīkṛtya yathā vyavahāre ekasmādanekasya cānekasmādekasya cotpattiḥ prasidhyati tathā dṛśyata eveti kathayāgāsa /
SA10ksmadhlu:3481_1: pravṛttyarthaṃ kāryahetvorbhedakāle yadi heturbhinnastadā kāryabhedo 'pi sutarāṃ syādityuktavān,
SA10ksmadhlu:3486: teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ samādhānamapi pṛthakpṛthasmāmiḥ pūrvameva kṛtam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3488: sa anaikāntika iti ye kathitavantasteṣāmapyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3490: tadā naiva tāni saṃvṛtāvapi bhavituṃ śakyānīti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3493: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi samādhānaṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pūrvaṃ samyaktayā kṛtameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3494: tathāpi ye tāvat kecana dveṣavaśād dūṣaṇāni prayuñjate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3500: tatra yaistāvat kadācid īśvarādayo nityaikatvasvabhāvena parikalpitāstaisteṣu kramotpādadharmayogo 'pi yataḥ svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3502: yato hyekasvabhāvatāyāmanutpādāsthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvakālavat paścātkāle 'pyutpādakasvabhāvatā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3503: yadyutpādaka eva svabhāvaḥ syāttadā pūrvāvasthātaḥ svabhāvasya bhinnalakṣaṇatvādekatvahānireva syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3505: yato hi tattvatāyāṃ samakālikatvamaparasmiṃśca svaparapratisandhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3506: ye tāvadākāśādīnāṃ trayāṇāmasaṃkṛtānāmekasvabhāvatvaṃ phalapratisandhānābhāvaṃ ca teṣāṃ svīkurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3509: yato hi pratyekajñānāttajjñeyasvabhāvastāvad bhinna eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3510: yadi na syāttadābhinnatvāt pūrvavat tajjñāne jñeyasvabhāvo naivopapannaḥ syādata ekasvabhāvastāvannaiva yujyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3512: ye tāvannityaikasvabhāvāḥ kālapuruṣapradhānabrahmādayaśca vicitrāyā asyā jagadvyavasthāyā hetutvena parikalpyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3513: te yadi satyāsatyādivividhasvabhāvāṃ vastusāmagrīṃ krameṇa yugapad vā gṛhṇantīti svīkriyate tadā tatsāmarthyata ekatvarahita eva svabhāve te niyamena te niyamena svīkṛtāḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3514: yato hi vividhasvabhāvasya jagato grahaṇe ekasvabhāvā naiva yujyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3518: ye tāvat pudgalāmidhaṃ padārthaṃ nityānityatvenānirvacanīyamiti parikalpayanti te 'uyenam ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvena sākṣāt svīkurvantyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3520: api ca, bhinnabhinnasvabhāvenānubhūyamānasya tāvat kṣaṇikatve 'nirvacanīyatā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3521: kāyaḥ bhūmiparvatādayo ye 'nityāḥ sāvayavāḥ pṛthaksvabhāvāstān ekadravyatnena parikalpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3522_1: teṣāṃ svīkṛtā syāt yato hi yadi tasya pratyekasminnavayave nāsti bhinnasvabhāvastadā
SA10ksmadhlu:3524: ye tāvad dehādīnāṃ paramāṇusañcayātmakatvāt tān paramāṇūn pṛthakśaḥ parikalpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3527: yato hi niraṃśasvabhāve [vastuni] yatraiva hi saṃyogādayo 'nubhūyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3529: yasmin pakṣeṇa kenacit saha saṃyogaḥ sañcayo vā na bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3533: paramāṇuṣu cāvayavidravyeṣu cobhayeṣu tāvadanekasvabhāvatvamapi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3534: yato hi sañcitasvabhāvātmakatvātte yadā naivaikasvabhāvatve yujyante tadā tatparatantratayā vyavasthitatvena teṣāmanekasvabhāvatvamapi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3535: itthaṃ yadā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi dravyamekānesvabhāvarahitaṃ siddham,
SA10ksmadhlu:3536: tadā tadādhārena kalpitanāṃ guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghātasya cāpi siddhiḥ sutarāṃ naiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3539: jñānamapi tāvat kāmamekasvabhāvamityupakalpyatāṃ kintu tatsvarūpaṃ vividhasyabhāvagrāhakamiti svīkṛtatvāt tatsāmarthyata ekasvabhāvarahitameva taditi svīkṛtaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3540: yato hi tajjñānaṃ tāvat sākāramityavaśyaṃ svīkarttavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3541: anyathā viṣayākāreṇa yo nākāritastasya jñānakāyasya viṣayaġ
SA10ksmadhlu:3543: yadi sākāratvena svīkriyate tadā tasyaikasvabhāvarahitatvamapi spaṣṭatayā svīkṛtameva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3546: ataḥ sarvāṇyeva tāvajjñānāni vibhinnānāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayitvena svīkriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3547: ata eva svayūthyāḥ 'sañcitālambanāḥ paścavijñānakāyāḥ' iti svīkurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3551: tatra vividhatāyāṃ [vicitratāyāṃ] svamatasthāpanārtha tāvadanekajñānotpattikalpanamapi nāsti samīcīnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3554: guṇakarmasamavetānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ tāvajjñānena yugapadgrahaṇasvīkārād apare 'pi [siddhāntavādinaḥ] jñānaṃ citrākāratvenaiva svīkurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3555: ye hi dravyaparyāyādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvaṃ vastu tāvanmecakamaṇivadityāmananti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3565: svapnādijñānānyapi nīlādivibhinnākārān anubhavantīti tanyekasvabhāvānīti naiva yuktāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:3567: te bāhyapadārthānāmaviṣayibhūtatvāttat svasaṃvedanasvarūpaṃ paryantaṃ ca jñānamiti svīkurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3568: te 'pyanādikālīnabhrāntavāsānāparipākavaśād rūpādivibhinnaviparītāvabhāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiṃ svīkurvantyato vijñānamekasvabhāvamiti naivābhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3569: phalato darśaneṣu kasminnapi vijñānaṃ naikasvabhāvamiti sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3571: tadā anekasvabhāvo 'pi na sidhyatīti bahuśaḥ pūrvamāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3572: ata eva svātantryeṇa sādhako hetirapyayaṃ nāsiddha iti yathoktanayena vādiprativādyubhyeṣu sarve dharma ekānekasvabhāvarahitā eva siddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3573: ye va vyavacchedamātrātmakāsteṣu sādhyasādhanānugato dharmeyeva avastubhūtaḥ sidhyatīti pūrvamanekadhā nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3580: yato hi yathoktanayenaiva te hetuṃ sādhayantīti /

SA10ksmadhlu:4005_1: samyaktayā kṣaṇikatvena sthitasya vastudharmiṇaḥ siddhirninirdaṣṭeti yaduktaṃ tadapyutpādavināśadharmiṇo
SA10ksmadhlu:4007: yato hi bhagavatā saṃskārāṇāmutpādavināśasvabhāvasya samyaganudarśanaṃ taduddeśaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāmiva nirmitasadṛśamityuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4009: āryadharmasaṃgītau hi tathāgatena bhayasthānasya parihārārthaṃ vyavahāre cotpādanirodhau tāvaduktau /
SA10ksmadhlu:4013: yathā mayā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10ksmadhlu:4017: sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā nāsanna sat punaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:4026: ye ca pratyutpanne pṛthagutpannāste vartamānakāla ityubhidhīyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:4027: vartamānakālotpannāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni na sthitāni nāpyasthitānīti parijñāyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:4039: trayātmakatvāt kṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇaṃ sthitiḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:4041: tadapi sūtrāntareṣu sakalasāmagrīsamavadhānāt samutpadyamānānāmagnidhūmādīnāṃ sāmānyena niṣedhaparakameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4042: ato naiva tat paramārthamadhikṛtyoktamiti nirdiṣṭameva pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4044: samavāyād vinirmukto buddhayā bhāvo na gṛhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4048: samavāyāt pṛthaṅ nāsti na cānyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:4050: na skandhā dhātavo naiva sarve dharmā alakṣaṇāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4057: ataḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpitasvabhāvatvāt tatsvabhāvasaṃgṛhītāstāvadagnidhūmādayo 'pi kalpitasvabhāvā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4063: paramārthastu yadā na kasyacanotpādastadāhetukatvaṃ tāvadanupapannameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4066: [59-60] āryadharmasaṃgītau tavaduktam - bodhisattvena tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yo vyāvahārikatvena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4077: [61] yacca tadā vastveva svīkṛtaṃ syādityuktaṃ tatpūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4078: [62-64] kā nāma saṃvṛtiryadi sarvamevāsaditi yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yuktisaṃṅgatam,
SA10ksmadhlu:4082: yacca samyaṅ niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu tasya tannivṛttakāre yā samāropikā bhrāntabuddhiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4084: athavā yayā tattvamāvriyate [yayā vā tattvabodhaḥ] bādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4087: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4099: tattvānyatvayostāvat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tattvānyatvavirodha iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4103: ato bhāvamabhāvaṃ vā svabhāvamāśrita yattāvaccodyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nirādhārameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4104: vastunyeva tāvad vidhirvā pratiṣedho vā sambhavī /
SA10ksmadhlu:4111: asāmarthādināṃ paramārthasatyāśritatvena sāmarthyādīnāṃ ca saṃvṛtisatyāśritatvena vyavasthīyamānatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:4112: māyāpuruṣādivat sarvavastuṣu bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt krmaśaḥ satyadvayabhedo vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4114: tathā sarvavastuṣu mithyākārena jñānena yadāropitaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4115: māyāpuruṣādau abhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate tathaiva sarvavastuṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ samyakpramāṇaiḥ sampratipādyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4117: ato māyādivyavahāra ivāpekṣāviśeṣena satyadvayaśritā ime sarvavyavahārā aviruddhā evetyavaśyamabhyupetavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4118: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā taimirikādyālambiteṣu keśādiṣu vijñānavādināṃ ca dvayābhāseṣu kimivemāni codyāni na syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4119: itthaṃ yadīme keśādayaḥ paramārthato 'santa eva tadā kathamiva te sadrūpeṇāvabhāsante,
SA10ksmadhlu:4120: kathamiva ca deśakālāvasthānāṃ pṛthaṅ niścayaḥ parigṛhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4121: utpādānutpādādayaḥ sadasatī ca parasparamekasmin naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4122: yato hi tatra yathā keśādiṣu dvayābhāseṣu ca bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthitasvabhāvasya saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyamāśritya saṃvṛtau sattvaṃ paramārthe cāsattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4124: tathaiva sarvavastūnāṃ sādṛśyena nedaṃ codyaṃ yujyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4126: teṣāmayamāśayaḥ - yena hetunā yathoktabhrāntanāṃ saṃvṛtasvabhāvānāṃ vastūnāṃ naiva samyagutpādo jāyate tathāpyutpattisādṛśyamupadṛśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4128: ata eva bhagavatā cāpyuktam - “bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā” iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:4131: pratyakṣeṇa va paramparayā vā kṛta bhedā api santi /
SA10ksmadhlu:4133: itthaṃ paramārthato 'nutpada iti samyagjñānena asiddhotpāda ityeva vakṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4134: ata ubhe api na sto 'sambaddhābhidhāne yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā bhavadbhirapi 'sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni' ityādīnāmarthaḥ kathamupanīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4135: kathaṃ vā bhavatāṃ satyadvayāśrito vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4136: yadi niyataṃ śabdārthamatiricya mithyaiva pare dūṣyante tadā spaṣṭamasambaddhāmevābhidhānaṃ parilakṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4138: yato hi cintanotpannasya prajñātattvasyāviparītatvena niyatacintanagatasamyakpramāṇabalotpannaṃ tathaiva bhāvanābalotpannamapi kalpitamevocyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4155: ataḥ karmaphalādīnāṃ pṛthakśo niyatavyavasthā yā atyantaparokṣā,
SA10ksmadhlu:4158: kecana śāstraracayitāraḥ prasiddhimatītya kalpanādisvabhāvatvenipakalpitaṃ vastu mithyāsaṃvṛtisaditi kathayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:4160: yattu pratītyasamutpadānukūlatvena parikalpitaṃ tattu” nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ” ityataḥ saṃvṛtisadevetyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4163: [66] yacca 'māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthaḥ' ityuktaṃ tadapyasatyārthe māyārthasya svīkārād doṣahitameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:4171: mithyāsvarūpasyāpi satyatvenāvabhāse sati naiva jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:4174: asatyasvabhāvasya mithyātvād bhrānte sati naiva jñānaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:4177: ato mithyāsvabhāvatvājjñānasvarūpe 'ntarjñeyavādināṃ mate mahān viśeṣo [bhedaḥ] jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4178: [67] saṃvṛtiḥ śabdamātrātmiketyādi yaduktaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣarūpeṇa svamatopakalpitmeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4186: teṣāmevaṃ kalpayatāṃ mataniṣedhāryamevābhidheyaṃ kalpanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitamityupadarśitaṃ saṃjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitamityādinā /
SA10ksmadhlu:4193: etāvanmātratve sati rūpadīnāṃ sarve vividhābhāsā na setsyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:4195: sūtre 'pi paramārthasatyanirdeśasāmarthyena sarveṣāṃ jñānajñeyābhidhānādīnāṃ saṃvṛtisatyatvena nirdiṣṭatvānnaiva te śabdamātratvena nirdiṣṭā iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:4199: yato hi nirviśeṣaḥ anutpannaḥ aniruddhaḥ abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādirahitaḥ sa iti /“
SA10ksmadhlu:4205: evaṃvidhaḥ paramārthaḥ saṃvṛtisatyanivṛttasvabhāva iti nirdeśo 'pi kathamupapannaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:4206: tatra paramārthatvena nirdiṣṭānāmārthānamavastubhūtānāṃ subhāṣitādivibhāgo 'pi naiva suśaka iti codyaṃ tāvat siddhasādhanameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4209: ataḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitatvena yadi tathatāsvabhāvo naiva vibhāgārhastadā naivāyaṃ kaścanāpi doṣa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:4210: ityevaṃ ye tāthāgatāgamāḥ pratyakṣaparokṣatayā paramārtathābhidhāyakā dehavatāṃ ca hitasukhajanakāste subhāṣitānītyucyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:4211: tadviparītāni na subhāṣitānīti teṣāṃ bhedaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:4212: bhavanmatānusāraṃ tavannāmnaḥ parikalpitasvabhāvatayopādānāt subhāṣitāsubhāṣitarupeṇa kathaṃ vyavasthā kriyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:4219: yato hi abhidheyādisamastavastūni paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvena māyādivat parikalpitasvabhāvāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:4221: tathaiva paramārthato niḥsvabhāvāni vastūni kathaṃ na vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:4222: viśeṣataḥ kevalaṃ vastusvabhāva eva śabdārthasāmānyasvarūpo bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tatra kimapi kāraṇaṃ naiva paśyāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4223: anādīti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vastubhūtaṃ tasyāpyasaditi sāmānyavyavahāro dṛśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4224: sukhādīni svasaṃvedyāṃ - nittyādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4225: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃvṛtyantargatatvāditi pūrvaṃ kṛta eva nirdeśaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4226: vastūni kevalamanidarśanasvabhāvāni eva bhaviṣyantīti yaduktaṃ tatrāpi nāsti kācana yuktiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4229: na tu satsvabhāvā nirdiṣṭā iti pūrvamuktameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4234: yatāvat paramārthe hyāropitasvabhāvaḥ sa saṃvṛtireva sa [paramārthastu] sarvaprapañcātītaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4238: yadi paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavākcittaniṣedhamātrasvabhāvaḥ syāttadā sa paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ na gacchet,
SA10ksmadhlu:4242: teṣu vastuvāsanāyā api pūrvaṃ kṛtaniṣedhāt kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyantargatābyeva tānyoto 'nyataḥ pūrtirnaivāvaśyakī /
SA10ksmadhlu:4243: yadi pramāṇairabhāvo naiva māyādibhirbhinnastathāpi paramārthataḥ svataḥ saditi nāma kriyate tadā saharṣaṃ kriyatāṃ svairamutsavo 'pyanubhūyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:4244: kintu svamatānakūlyena kṛtāṃ vyavasthāṃ vastūni naivānuvidadhate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4245: pratītyasamutpannatā svasaṃvedyatā ca naiva vastūno heturbhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:4247: yadyapratītyasamutpannatve vastūni naiva dṛśyate tadā tadadarśanamanyatrāpi tathaiva syāditi kathanasambaddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:4252: vastūnāṃ yadi samyaktvaṃ tadā sthitatvāsthitatvatoḥ parasparavirodho 'pyanupapanna eveti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:4256: tāni sarvāṇi calasvabhāvāni vastūni māyādivat prakṛtyā niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇarahitāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:4258: so 'pi [svabhāva] tathāgataḥ syānnavā syāt sarvadā sthitatvānnityaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4264: satya iva prasiddhatvāt taccintanādhikareṇa satyeti nāmnā vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4271: tayā vyavasthitaṃ jagat tadadhikāreṇa yataḥ satyamityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4272: ataḥ saṃvṛtiravaśyaṃ vastutayā svīkartavyeti yaduktaṃ tasyāpyayuktatvāt pratijñā naiva hāpayituṃ śakyā /
SA10ksmadhlu:4274: yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:4275: yadyapramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ tayā nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam?
SA10ksmadhlu:4277_0: yato hi yathā anumānajñānasya mithyākāragrahaṇapravṛtatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvatve 'pi
SA10ksmadhlu:4281: [72] yāni vijñānādīni saṃvṛtibījāni tāni paramārthato 'ṅgīkarttavyānīti yaduktaṃ tanna yaktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4283: yato hyeteṣāṃ svānurūpahetavastāvadanādisaṃvṛtirūpā iti svīkriyanta eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:4285: yadi tad bījaṃ paramārthasiddhamekaṃ ceti tadā kutrāpi tadanvayābhāvādanaikāntikameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4286: vṛkṣādyaśeṣasaṃvṛtioināṃ yadyuttaropādānahetvānukūlyaṃ na parikṣiṣyante tadā ramaṇīyatāmātrameva dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:4288: yakṣānurūpabaleḥ sadbhāvāt sarvāstāḥ saṃvṛtayo 'satsvabhāvāḥ prasādhitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4289: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] katha tāḥ saṃvṛtaya iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:4292: tadviruddhatvād asiddhatvāt pramāṇabādhitatvācceti tā gauṇā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4293: [73] vastusvabhāvastāvat svīkriyata iti yaduktaṃ tattu yena kāraṇena vastusvabhāvaḥ svīkriyate tena satyadvayabhedānudhānaṃ kutrāpi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:4295: teṣu ye utpādādayaḥ samāropyante te saṃvṛtisatyatvena vyāvasthāpyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:4296: pramāṇaiḥ samyaṅ nirupya anāropitā ye tāvadanutpādādayaste paramārthasatyatayā vyāhriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:4297: ataḥ paramārthato 'satyapi vastusvabhāve satyadvayaṃ vyāvasthāpyata eveti gauṇā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4302: aviparītasya jñānasya artha iti viṣaya iti kṛtvā sā paramārtha ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4303: yatkhalu viṣayi lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tadanyaśbdārthaprayogairapi vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4304: śravaṇamananabhāvanopajātāyāḥ prajñāyā anukūlatvād vyavahāreṇaiva sā evamabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4305: tatra yena kāraṇena paramārthatattvalakṣaṇabhāvanayā yogibhiraśeṣasaṃkleśān parihatya uttarottaraprajñādiviśeguṇāṃścadhigamya mahārthatvaṃ prasādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4307: tadapi lokottaraṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sarvakalpanāvigatatvāt sarvadharmanirābhāsatvācca svasaṃvedyamanupalambhātmakaṃ ca,
SA10ksmadhlu:4310: anena vastuviṣayataḥ samyagatītatvena nirdeśādālambanadarśanasya niṣedha eva kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4313: api ca, yadyasti tāvadekaḥ tāvadekaḥ kaścana gauṇaḥ paramārthastadā nirvāṇaṃ tāvat kīdṛśaḥ paramārthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:4314: tatra kasyāpi vastunaḥ samyaktayā arthasvabhāvasambhavābhāvāt tadapi kathamebhiścodyairanavamardanīyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:4316: paramārthe vastūni tāvanna santīti yaduktaṃ tadapi paramārthamadhikṛtya jñānātmakatvaṃ samyagaviparītatvenāsadevetyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4317: ekena khalu prakāreṇa paramārthastāvadasanniti yaduktaṃ tattattvato vicāreṇāsadevetyarthaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4318: [75] saṃvṛtiparamārthayorekatvamiti yaduktaṃ tatra bhagavān paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskāralakṣaṇena saha tattvato nānyaṃ nānanyamiti svayamevoktavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:4320: “yaduta yadi paramārthalakṣaṇam saṃskārebhyo nānyaṃ [abhinna] syāttadā sarve bālapṛthagjanāḥ satyadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4322: yathā ca saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśalakṣaṇāstathaiva paramārtho 'pi saṃkleśalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:4323: tathā ca yathā paramārthaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣvabhinnastathā saṃskāralakṣaṇanyapi[abhinnāni] syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4326: bhūtārthaprāpteranantaraṃ yogibhiḥ paramārthagaveṣaṇaṃ naiva yujyata iti paramārthastāvat saṃskārebhyo nāstyanyo nānyo 'pīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:4329: nimittabandhanairamuktatvānna ca te doṣṭhulyabandhanādapi muktāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4331_0: api ca, paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ yadi saṃskāralakṣaṇebhyo bhinnaṃ syāttadā na syāt paramārthaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:4331_1: saṃskārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam na ca paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā vā syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:4335: paramārthalakṣaṇe tu niḥsvabhāvatvena tattvānyatvābhyaṃ vastu nābhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4336: vastusattve hi tattvānyatvabodhasya sambhavānna tu niḥsvabhāve vastuni tatsambhavaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4338: jñānātmakaparamartho 'pi saṃvṛtyā saha tathatālakṣaṇe paramārthākāre ekatvena svīkriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4347: jñānātmakastu paramārtho māyādibhirabhinnatvāt samyaksaṃvṛtisvabhāvaśca tattvāvabodhānukūlatvāt paramārthasvabhāvaśca /
SA10ksmadhlu:4351: itthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭisamutthitā eva dānādayaḥ parisuddahetusamutthitatvādiṣṭaphalaṃ viśeṣaphalaṃ cābhinirharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:4356: atastatsamutthitapāramitānaṃ sarvo 'pi prayāso mithyātmātmīyasamutthitadānādivad aviśuddhahetusamutthitatvenātyantaṃ nirbala eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:4362: yena kāraṇena dānādiṣvapravṛteḥ puṇyābhāvastāni dātavyādīni naivātyantamasadbhūtāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:4369: upākuśalā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parisampadayanti?
SA10ksmadhlu:4371: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā parityajanti tadā māyābuddhireva ṭeṣāṃ dāne sūpatiṣṭhatīti” vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4372: ata eva bhagavan ye bodhisattvā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:4377: kintu pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāṃ tāvat te pravartanta eva /
